	This Annual Report on Form 10-K contains forward-looking statements within the meaning of Section 27A of the Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and Section 21E of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended. These forward-looking statements are based on our current expectations, estimates and projections about our business, industry, management&#x2019;s beliefs and certain assumptions made by us. Words such as

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	t

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he dependence of our current and future revenue and prospects on third-party license, promotion or distribution agreements, including the need to renew such agreements, enter into similar agreements, or end arrangements that SciClone does not believe are beneficial;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">

<A NAME="eolPage4"></A>
<EFX_PART_I>
<A NAME="FIS_PART_I"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	PART I
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_BUSINESS>
<A NAME="FIS_BUSINESS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 6PT 55.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -55.45PT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Item&nbsp;1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 34PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231X10K_HTM_BUSINESS">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Overview
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	SciClone Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (NASDAQ: SCLN) is a United States (&#x201C;US&#x201D;)-headquartered, China-focused, specialty pharmaceutical company with a substantial commercial business and a product portfolio of therapies for oncology, infectious diseases and cardiovascular disorders. We are focused on continuing to grow our revenue and profitability. Our business and corporate strategy is focused primarily on the People&#x2019;s Republic of China (&#x201C;China&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	or &#x201C;PRC&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	) where we have built a solid reputation and established a strong brand through many years of experience marketing our lead product, ZADAXIN
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(thymalfasin). In addition, we have an established product promotion business model with large pharmaceutical partners and we are focused on establishing profitability in all of these collaborations. We believe our sales and marketing strengths position us to benefit from the long-term expansion of the pharmaceutical market in China
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Th
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e Chinese
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	pharmaceutical market currently ranks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	second
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	among the global pharmaceutical markets, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	had an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	estimated worth
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$105 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in 2014
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. It is forecasted to increase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	significantly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to $200 billion by 2020.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	seek to expand our presence in China and increase revenues by growing sales and profits of our current product portfolio, launching new products from our development pipeline, adding new, profitable product services agreements and leveraging our strong cash position to in-license additional products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We operate in two segments which are generally based on the nature and location of our customers: 1) China and 2) the Rest of the World, which includes our US and Hong Kong operations.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We have two categories of revenues: &#x201C;product sales revenues&#x201D; and &#x201C;promotion services revenues.&#x201D; Our product sales revenues result from our proprietary and in-licensed products, including our lead product, ZADAXIN; DC Bead
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a product for the embolization of malignant hypervascularized tumors, for which we initiated sales and recorded product revenue beginning in the third quarter of 2015, and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	products from Pfizer International Trading (Shanghai) Ltd. (&#x201C;Pfizer&#x201D;). Through June 30, 2015, our product sales revenues also included Aggrastat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, an intervention cardiology product launched in China in 2009, in-licensed from Cardiome Pharma Corp (&#x201C;Cardiome&#x201D;).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In August 2015, we and Cardiome mutually agreed to end our collaboration for Aggrastat, thereby terminating our exclusive distribution rights in China, and return
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ing
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	all rights to the product to Cardiome. We recorded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Aggrastat revenues of $1.8 million, $1.1 million and $0 million for the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014, and 2013, respectively, and we do not expect to generate any further Aggrastat revenues. We do not anticipate that the termination of this agreement wil
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	l adversely affect our profitability.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	ZADAXIN has the highest margins in our portfolio as it is a premium product sold exclusively by SciClone. In addition, we anticipate that new marketed products, when and if introduced, can increase the future revenues and profitability of our pharmaceutical business in China over the coming years. Our &#x201C;promotion&nbsp;services revenues&#x201D; result primarily from fees we receive for exclusively promoting products in China for Baxter International, Inc. (&#x201C;Baxter&#x201D;). We recognize promotion services revenues as a percentage of our collaborators&#x2019; product sales revenue for these exclusively promoted products.&nbsp;Over time, as additional proprietary or in-licensed products come to the market, we aim to shift our product mix towards those products providing higher margins for us.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ZADAXIN is approved in over 30 countries and may be used for the treatment of HBV, HCV, and certain ca
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ncers, and as a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immune
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enhancer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	according to the local regulatory approvals we have in these countries. In China, thymalfasin is included in the treatment guidelines issued by the Ministry of Health (&#x201C;MOH&#x201D;) for liver cancer, as well as guidelines for treatment of chronic HBV (issued by both the Chinese Medical Association and the Asian-Pacific Association for the Study of the Liver) and invasive fungal infections of critically ill patients (issued by the Chinese Medical Association). Our sales force is focused on increasing sales to the country&#x2019;s largest hospitals (class 3A with over 500 beds) as well as mid-size hospitals (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	class 2A). These hospitals serve Tier 1 and Tier 2 cities located mostly in the eastern part of China, which are the largest and generally have the most affluent populations. We are widening our market strategies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	by piloting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	e-commerce approaches to reaching customers.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We are also seeking to expand the indications for which ZADAXIN could be used, including sepsis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We initiated sales and recorded our first product revenue from DC Bead in the third quarter of fiscal 2015. The China Food and Drug Administration had approved the registration of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	DC Bead
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for the embolization of malignant hypervascularized tumors in August 2014. DC Bead may be used to treat liver cancer, a large and growing indication in China, and we believe our oncology sales team and academic marketing liaisons have established high quality relationships with medical professionals and institutions that specialize in cancer treatment, which we believe will be a valuable asset as we continue commercial sales of DC Bead. BioCompatibles UK Ltd.
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage5"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(&#x201C;BTG&#x201D;) and SciClone previously entered into an agreement granting SciClone exclusive licensing and distribution rights to DC Bead in China. Under the agreement, we are purchasing DC Bead product from BTG.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We are also pursuing the registration of several other therapeutic products in China. These include: Loramyc
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, a mucoadhesive tablet formulation of miconazole lauriad to treat oropharyngeal candidiasis; and RapidFilm
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, an oral film formulation of ondansetron to treat nausea induced by chemotherapy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our agreement with Baxter is for a 5-yea
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	r term, through December 2017,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and our agreement with Pfizer is for a 5-year term, through June 2019. We are pursuing additional agreements to generate additional revenue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We continue to seek in-licensing arrangements for well-differentiated products at various stages of development tha
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	t, if not yet approved, have a defined regulatory approval pathway in China. Our o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	bjective is to in-license products that provide us with higher margins, augmenting our product sales revenue and profitability, and we continue to explore opportunities to optimize our promotion services revenues.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In May 2015, Theravance Biopharma, Inc. (&#x201C;Theravance Biopharma&#x201D;) granted SciClone exclusive development and commercialization rights to VIBATIV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(telavancin) in China, as well as the Hong Kong SAR, the Macau SAR, Taiwan and Vietnam, in exchange for upfront and regulatory milestone payments totaling $6 million. SciClone will be responsible for all aspects of development and commercialization in the partnered regions, including pre- and post-launch activities and product registration. SciClone will initially develop VIBATIV for hospital-acquired bacterial pneumonia and ventilator-associated bacterial pneumonia, and additional indications may include complicated skin and skin structure infections and potentially bacteremia. Theravance Biopharma will sell to SciClone all clinical and commercial product required to develop and commercialize VIBATIV in China and our other licensed territories.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In December 2014, we entered into a strategic partnership with The Medicines Company for two cardiovascular products in China. The partnership includes an agreement granting us a license and the exclusive rights in China to promote two products including 1) Angiomax
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(bivalirudin) for Injection, an anticoagulant indicated in patients undergoing percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI) with provisional use of glycoprotein IIb/IIIa inhibitor (GPI) and in patients with, or at risk of, heparin-induced thrombocytopenia and thrombosis syndrome undergoing PCI for which a Phase 3 registration trial was completed in China and is currently under review by the China Food and Drug Administration for marketing approval, and 2) Cleviprex
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(clevidipine) Injectable Emulsion, a third-generation dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker indicated for the reduction of blood pressure when oral therapy is not feasible or desirable for which a clinical trial application (CTA) for China was filed in 2013.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We received CTA approval from the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	China Food and Drug Administration (&#x201C;CFDA&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in early 2016 and are preparing a clinical study.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Under the terms of the agreement, we will be responsible for all aspects of commercialization, including pre-and post-launch activities, for both products in the China market (excluding Hong Kong and Macao). We have also agreed to participate in the China registration process for both products. Financial terms of the agreement, in addition to net sales royalties payable to The Medicines Company, include the following additional payments to The Medicines Company: an upfront payment made in the fourth quarter of 2014; a project support services fee; and regulatory/commercial success milestone payments of up to an aggregate of $50.5 million.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In June 2013, we entered into a license agreement with Taiwan Liposome Company (&#x201C;TLC&#x201D;) which granted us a license and the exclusive rights in China, Hong Kong and Macao to promote, market, distribute and sell ProFlow
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for the treatment of peripheral arterial disease (&#x201C;PAD&#x201D;) and other indications. PAD is a serious cardiovascular condition in which blood flow to the limbs (usually the legs) is restricted due to arterial plaque build-up. Under the terms of the agreement, TLC will be responsible for the continued development including potential clinical trials and regulatory activities, as well as the manufacture and supply of ProFlow, and we will be responsible for all aspects of commercialization including pre-and post-launch activities. The agreement provides for the principal terms of the arrangement between SciClone and TLC, and in March 2014, the companies entered into a supplemental collaboration and license agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In November 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	TLC was notified by the CFDA that ProFlow did not receive clinical trial approval and TLC is in the process of appealing the decision.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In May 2013, we entered into a framework agreement with Zensun (Shanghai) Science &amp; Technology Co., Ltd. (&#x201C;Zensun&#x201D;) for the exclusive promotion, marketing, distribution and sale of Neucardin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	TM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in China, Hong Kong and Macao. Neucardin is a novel, first-in-class therapeutic for the treatment of patients with intermediate to advanced heart failure, for which a New Drug Application (&#x201C;NDA&#x201D;) was submitted to and accepted for review by the CFDA in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2012.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In December 2013, t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	he CFDA informed Zensun that its Phase 2 data is insufficient, and has asked Zensun to submit a new NDA once the ongoing Phase 3 study reached its endpoints.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As part of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	agreement with Zensun, we agreed to loan up to $12 million to Zensun, of which $12 million had been loaned as of December
</FONT>
</P>
<P>

</FONT>

	&nbsp;

<A NAME="eolPage6"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(refer to Note 6 to the consolidated financial statements appearing under
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Part II, Item 8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for further information regarding the Zensun loans).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014 and 2013, we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	recognized $7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, $11 million and $5.0 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, respectively, in research and development expenses related to our in-license arrangements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Recent governmental policy changes in China have eliminated national regulation of the maximum retail drug prices for most drugs effective as of June 1, 2015.&nbsp;Decisions by provincial authorities appear to be emerging as the primary governmental mechanism for price controls.&nbsp;As an example, the Zhejiang provincial authority announced a price limitation for sales of ZADAXIN in the province in April 2015 that became effective in May 2015.&nbsp;We were able to mitigate the impact of this price limitation by shifting an equitable portion of the burden of the price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	reduction to our distributor in our sales channel; accordingly, the impact of the price reduction through the year ended December 31, 2015 was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million. We anticipate that provincial pricing decisions will continue to be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a significant factor in the China pharmaceutical market for the foreseeable future. The impact of such decisions on our future results is unpredictable, but we expect that pricing pressures on revenue in 2016 will be offset at least in significant part through sharing of the burden with our China distributor and potentially t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hrough volume increases.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	However, in the future, prices could be reduced to levels significantly below those that would prevail in an unregulated market, which may limit the growth of our revenues or cause them to decline.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As previously disclosed, since 2010 the US Securities and Exchange Commission (&#x201C;SEC&#x201D;) and the US Department of Justice (&#x201C;DOJ&#x201D;) had each been conducting formal investigations of us regarding a range of matters, including the possibility of violations of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (&#x201C;FCPA&#x201D;). On February 4, 2016, we announced that we had entered into a settlement agreement with the SEC fully resolving the SEC&#x2019;s investigation into possible violations of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FCPA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Under the terms of the settlement agree
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ment, in February 2016 we paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a total of $12.8 million, including disgorgement, pre-judgment interest and a penalty as final settlement which was released from our restricted escrow account which we funded in the fourth quarter of 2015. This payment is in line with the charges we previously recorded and disclosed in our Form 10-Q filed with the SEC on August 10, 2015. As part of the agreement we neither admitted nor denied engagement in any wrongdoing and we agreed to give status reports to the SEC for the next three years on our continued remediation and implementation of anti-corruption compliance measures. The DOJ has also completed its related investigation and has declined to pursue any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	action (refer to Notes 18 and 22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to the consolidated financial statements appearing under Part II, Item 8 and &#x201C;Legal Proceedings&#x201D; in Part I, Item 3 for further information regarding the SEC and DOJ investigations).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 11PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-SIZE:11PT;">
	BUILDING A LEADING INTERNATIONAL PHARMACEUTICAL BUSINESS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our Established Business in China
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In China, we have established product revenue and positive cash flow. We are committed to building on this base and introducing additional pharmaceutical products to meet the country&#x2019;s evolving healthcare needs. China state leaders are continuing to implement a health care reform plan which, among other things, is seeking to expand patient access to pharmaceuticals.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We believe the China pharmaceutical market may grow up to 10% annually over the next several years.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We launched ZADA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	XIN in China in 1996 and by 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our annual worldwide sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	this product reached more
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	than $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	146
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 96% of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which were sales to China. Today, ZADAXIN is one of the largest imported ph
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	armaceutical products in China, measured by revenue. We estimate our market share of thymalfasin by units is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	15
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	%.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Over the last decade, we have established a sales and marketing organization and strong importation relationships with distribution channels that have facilitated strong growth in sales, and profitability, and substantial cash flow. Through our extensive China sales organization of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	56
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0 professionals including approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	45
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0 &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	sales personnel, we believe we have developed a good reputation and relationships with physicians and administrators. We serve approximately 2,000 hospitals with approximately 300 of the largest hospitals in the major cities in China contributing approximately 80% of our business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We have built a strong commercial presence in liver disease, cancer and the intensive care setting. We are expanding geographically in China to position the Company for further growth. ZADAXIN has strong brand recognition and is positioned as a high-quality, imported product. ZADAXIN is approved in China for the treatment of HBV a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nd for use as a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immune
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enhancer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. It is also included in the treatment guidelines issued by the MOH for liver cancer. In China, orders for ZADAXIN are filled largely by distributors and sub-distributors which purchase ZADAXIN from our selected, established, government-licensed importing agents.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage7"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In 2013, Sinopharm and Sanofi

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	periods. As of December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately $38.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3 million or 96
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	% of our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	gross accounts receivable were attributable to Sino
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	harm.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Chinese government is continuing its efforts to reduce overall health care costs, including pricing controls on pharmaceutical products. Individual provinces in China and, in some cases, individual hospitals can and have established pricing requirements for a product to be included on formulary lists. In some cases, these prices have been significantly lower than our distributors have been selling ZADAXIN, in which case we have been removed from formulary lists, which consequently has reduced sales to certain hospitals and could adversely affect our future sales. The price for pharmaceutical products is regulated in China. The process and timing for price restrictions is unpredictable. In addition, we are aware that ZADAXIN may be used on an off-label basis, and the Chinese government&#x2019;s pricing, reimbursement or other actions might reduce such uses.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	International Sales and Marketing
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ZADAXIN is approved in over 30 countries, primarily in China and countries in the Pacific Rim, Latin America, Eastern Europe, and the Middle East regions. ZADAXIN&#x2019;s approvals are principally for the treatment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of HBV and as a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	n
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immune
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enhancer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, with additional approvals in certain countries for the treatment of HCV, or as a chemotherapy
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immune
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enhancer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for cancer patients with weakened immune systems. We sell ZADAXIN in various international markets through our wholly owned subsidiary, SciClone Pharmaceuticals International Ltd. (&#x201C;SPIL&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	).
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	SPIL is registered in the Cayman Islands and its principal office is in Hong Kong. SPIL orders ZADAXIN from our European manufacturer and contracts with a third party for the storage of our finished goods inventory at warehousing facilities in Hong Kong. SPIL then distributes our product worldwide from these warehousing facilities based on purchase orders from our customers. Under our established distribution arrangements, local importers and distributors are responsible for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	importation, inventory, distribution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and invoicing of ZADAXIN after importation.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Product sales of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	146.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$126.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and $96.3 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for the years ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and 2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, respectively, were from sales of ZADAXIN.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	SciClone&#x2019;s Lead Product ZADAXIN (Thymalfasin)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ZADAXIN is SciClone&#x2019;s synthetic preparation of thymalfasin, scientifically referred to as thymosin alpha 1, a thymic peptide which circulates in the blood naturally and is instrumental in the immune response to certain cancers and infections. Published scientific and clinical studies have shown that thymalfasin helps to stimulate and direct the body&#x2019;s immune response to eradicate infectious diseases, such as HBV, HCV, bacterial, and fungal infections; to fight certain cancers such as melanoma and liver cancer; and to enhance response to vaccines. Thymalfasin appears to be well tolerated, with few reports of significant side effects or toxicities associated with its use.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Thymalfasin elicits a variety of immune system responses. Acting on intracellular signaling pathways, thymalfasin increases the Th1 subset of T-helper cells that&nbsp;assist with fighting invading viruses and cancers and leads to a boost in production of antibodies in response to vaccines. Thymalfasin also results in decreased CD-4 cell differentiation into the Th2 subset of CD-4 helper cells that produce cytokines, such as IL-4, which are associated with persistence of viral infection, and stimulates several other components of the immune response that help the body attack and kill virally-infected or tumor cells.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	7
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage8"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Thymalfasin f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	or Treatment of Sepsis
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Clinical trials have shown that thymalfasin improves survival in patients in intensive care units being treated for sepsis from severe bacterial infections. One publication describes the results from a large, multicenter, single-blind, randomized, and controlled trial in 361 subjects in China. This study showed that the 28-day mortality from any cause was 26% in the ZADAXIN group, versus 35% in the control group, an effect that is clinically important (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	= 0.062 non-stratified analysis,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	= 0.049 log-rank). Greater improvement in the biomarker HLA-DR was also seen in subjects treated with ZADAXIN (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	= 0.037). No serious drug-related adverse events were recorded. These data support the usefulness of ZADAXIN in treating severe sepsis.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Thymalfasin for Enh
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	ancement of Response to Vaccine
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Clinical trials have demonstrated that thymalfasin increases response to influenza and hepatitis B vaccines in the elderly and in hemodialysis patients. In elderly subjects, thymalfasin was also shown to decrease the incidence of influenza from 19% in subjects given an influenza vaccine alone, to 6% in subjects receiving thymalfasin treatment in addition to the influenza vaccine. For these clinical trials, the treatment regimen involved 8 to 10 injections of 1.6 mg doses of thymalfasin. A clinical study conducted in 2009/2010 by Sigma-Tau Finanziaria, S.p.A. in Italy, however, showed that a higher dose of thymalfasin (3.2 or 6.4 mg) given only twice (seven days prior to vaccination and on the day of vaccination) was also effective. ZADAXIN in treatment led to a statistically significant increase in the percent of subjects who seroconverted to the H1N1 vaccine (MF59 adjuvanted monovalent vaccine, Focetria&#x2122; from Novartis), and an increase in total titers, when measured at 21 or 42 days after vaccination. While this effect was no longer seen at time points 84 and 168 days after vaccination, the enhancement effect of ZADAXIN provided a significant enhancing effect in the critical first six weeks following vaccination. These promising data further support the utility of thymalfasin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for use in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immune system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enhancement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY AND PROPRIETARY RIGHTS
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:54.25PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Patents
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We seek regulatory approval for our products in disease areas with high unmet medical need, significant market potential and where we have a proprietary position through patents covering use, manufacturing process, or composition of matter for our products. For our lead product ZADAXIN, we are the licensee or owner of patents and patent applications relating to thymalfasin and its use for a number of diseases. In particular, we are the licensee or owner of patents and applications in the US or China that are directed to thymalfasin therapy for the treatment of hepatitis B and/or hepatitis C as a monotherapy or in combination with other therapeutics, including drugs with or without regulatory approval for marketing.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In China, patent number ZL99811382.4 has been granted for ZADAXIN for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	hronic
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	h
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	epatitis B that expires in 2019.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, we are the licensee or owner of several patents and applications in the US and internationally that are directed to thymalfasin therapy for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	immune system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	enhancement. The expiring patent terms for issued or to be issued patents are from 2025 to 203
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. We are also the licensee or owner of several applications in China that are directed to thymalfasin therapy for the treatment of melanoma. The expiring patent term for these patents, if issued, is 2028. We are also the licensee or owner of patents in the US and China that are directed to thymalfasin therapy for reducing side effects of chemotherapy.&nbsp;The expiring patent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	terms for these issued patents are from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2020
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	-2021
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;We have also applied for patents in the US and internationally that are directed to thymalfasin therapy for the treatment of severe sepsis and acute infection, as well as more specific patents for certain infections such as Aspergillus and severe acute respiratory syndrome (&#x201C;SARS&#x201D;). In addition, we have issued patents in the US and China dire
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	cted to thymalfasin conjugates. We have also applied for patents in the US and internationally that are directed to thymalfasin therapy for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	urulent rhinosinusitis.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Furthermore, we have applied for patents in the US and internationally that relate to use of thymalfasin as an immune system enhancer for the treatment of cancer. The expiring patent term for these patents, if issued, is 2035.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	With respect to our issued patents in the US and Europe, we are also entitled to obtain a patent term extension to extend the patent expiration date.&nbsp;For example, in the US, we can apply for a patent term extension of up to five years for one of the patents covering ZADAXIN if ZADAXIN is approved by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	US Food and Drug Administration (&#x201C;FDA&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;The exact duration of the extension depends on the time we spend in clinical trials as well as getting a new drug app
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	lication approval from the FDA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	8
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;

<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage9"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Proprietary Rights
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition to patent protection, we intend to use other means to protect our proprietary rights. We may pursue marketing exclusivity periods that are available under regulatory provisions in certain countries, including the US, Europe, Japan, and China. For example, if we are the first to obtain market approval of a product, e.g., thymalfasin in the US, we would expect to receive at least fi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ve years of market exclusivity.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Furthermore, orphan drug exclusivity has been or may be sought where available. Such exclusivity has a term of seven years in the US and 10 years in Europe. We have obtained orphan drug designation for thymalfasin for the treatment of malignant melanoma and chronic hepatitis B in the US and for the treatment of hepatocellular carcinoma in the US and in Europe. We
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	own
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	trademark
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	registrations
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	worldwide for ZADAXIN and other trademarks that appear on our commercial packaging and promotional literature. Copyrights for the commercial packaging may prevent counterfeit products or genuine but unauthorized products from entering a particular country by parallel importation. Brand and trademark protection are particularly important to us in China. We have implemented anti-counterfeiting measures on commercial packaging and we have registered the packaging with customs departments in countries where such procedures exist. We rely upon trade secrets, which we seek to protect in part by entering into confidentiality agreements with our employees, consultants, corporate part
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ners, suppliers, and licensees.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	MANUFACTURING
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ZADAXIN is manufactured for us in Europe by third parties under exclusive contract manufacturing and supply agreements. We closely monitor production runs of ZADAXIN and conduct our own quality assurance audit programs. We believe the manufacturing facilities of our contract suppliers are in compliance with the FDA&#x2019;s current Good Manufacturing Practices (&#x201C;GMP&#x201D;), and European equivalents of such standards. In order to sell ZADAXIN to the licensed importers in China, our manufacturers must 1) be approved by the Italian Ministry of Health (&#x201C;AIFA&#x201D;) and 2) be accepted by the CFDA, the Chinese regulatory agency, and we must obtain an Imported Drug License from the CFDA permitting the importation of ZADAXIN into China. The license must be renewed every five years, and our next renewal will be required in December 2017. If we change manufacturers, these changes must 1) be approved by AIFA in Italy and 2) be accepted by the CFDA, and we must obtain a new Impor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ted Drug License from the CFDA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In the event of the termination of an agreement with any single supplier, we believe that we would be able to enter into arrangements with other suppliers with similar terms. We do not intend at this time to acquire or establish our own dedicated manufacturing facilities for any of our products. We believe that our current manufacturing partners for ZADAXIN have enough manufacturing capacity to meet potential market demand.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We also believe that we will be able to meet our clinical trial needs and market demand for our other drug candidates when needed with our current manufacturing partners and through pursuing new relationships with additional manufacturing partners.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	COMPETITION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our competition for sales of ZADAXIN in China is primarily from generic drug manufacturers located in China that sell their product at lower prices. We compete with them based on our reputation as a provider of high quality products, including the fact that our products are produced at US and western European GMP facilities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our competitors for existing and future products include pharmaceutical companies, biotechnology firms, universities and other research institutions, in the US, China and other territories, that are actively engaged in research and development or marketing of products in the therapeutic areas we are pursuing. We believe that the principal competitive factors in this industry for a marketed drug include the efficacy, safety, price, therapeutic regimen, manufacturing, quality assurance and associated patents and the capabilities of its marketer.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Most of our competitors, particularly large pharmaceutical companies, have substantially greater financial, technical, regulatory, manufacturing, marketing and human resource capabilities than ours. Most of them also have extensive experience in undertaking the preclinical and clinical testing and in obtaining the regulatory approvals necessary to market drugs. Additional mergers and acquisitions in the biotechnology and pharmaceutical industries may result in even more resources being concentrated with our competitors.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>

<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	9
</FONT>
</P>

	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage10"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For the treatment of HBV, current therapies being marketed by competitors include interferon alpha, in standard and pegylated forms, nucleoside analogues, such as lamivudine and entecavir, and nucleotide analogue adefovir. In addition to these products, in our largest market, China, ZADAXIN faces competition from other synthetic and generic biological extracts that are locally manufactured and significantly lower priced.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Future clinical trials may or may not show ZADAXIN or our other products in the market or in development to have advantages or value over such existing or future competitive products.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	RESEARCH AND DEVELOPMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Research and development (&#x201C;R&amp;D&#x201D;) expenses consist of independent R&amp;D costs relating to the conduct of clinical trials and costs associated with in-licensing arra
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ngements. R&amp;D expenses were
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12.3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	14.6 million, $8.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million, for the years ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2013, respectively.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014 and 2013, R&amp;D expenses included
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.5 million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$11.0 million and $5.0 million, respectively, related to upfront
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and milestone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	payments made under our in-license arrangements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	During 2015, under our subsidiary SciClone Pharmaceuticals International (Cayman) Development Limited, we incorporated two further subsidiaries, SciClone Pharmaceuticals (Hong Kong) Development Company Ltd., and SciClone Pharmaceuticals (Sha
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nghai) Development Company Ltd. Our development entities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	conduct various research and development activities including those relating to in-licensing arrangements and the conduct of clinical trials.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	EMPLOYEES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As of December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	590
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	employees: approximately
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	56
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	0 in China, approximately 20 in the US, and approximately 10 in other countries. From time to time
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, we engage the services of consultants worldwide with pharmaceutical and business backgrounds to assist in our product development an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	d commercialization activities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	GOVERNMENT REGULATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Regulation by governmental authorities in the US, China and other foreign countries is a significant factor in the manufacturing and marketing of our products, as well as in ongoing research and development activities and in pre-clinical and clinical trials and testing related to our products.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our products in clinical development in the US, China and other foreign countries are subject to approval by the FDA, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	CFDA and similar regulatory authorities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Manufacturing establishments are subject to inspections by regulatory authorities at the federal, state and local level and must comply with current GMP as established in various jurisdictions. In complying with GMP standards, manufacturers must continue to expend time, money and effort in the area of production and quality assurance to ensure ongoing full technical compliance.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We also conduct a separate review of products on an ongoing basis to test and maintain compliance with GMP standards.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	China
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In China, the pharmaceutical industry is subject to extensive government regulation and supervision. The regulatory framework addresses all aspects of operating in the pharmaceutical industry, including approval, pricing, re-imbursement, production, licensing and certification requirements and procedures, periodic renewal and reassessment processes, registration of new drugs and environmental protection.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The CFDA is the authority that monitors and supervises the administration of pharmaceutical products and medical appliances and equipment as well as food, health food and cosmetics in China. The primary responsibilities of the CFDA include:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	formulating administrative rules and policies concerning the supervision and administration of food, health food, cosmetics and the pharmaceutical industry;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	evaluating, registering and approving of new drugs, generic drugs, imported drugs and traditional Chinese medicine;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	approving and issuing permits for the manufacture and export/import of pharmaceutical products, medical appliances and equipment and approving the establishment of enterprises to be engaged in the manufacture and distribution of pharmaceutical products; and
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	10
</FONT>
