<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage11"></A>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	examining and evaluating the safety of food, health food and cosmetics and handling significant accidents involving these products.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The MOH is an authority at the ministerial level under the State Council and is primarily responsible for national public health and has administrative responsibility for the CFDA. The MOH performs a variety of tasks in relation to the health industry such as establishing social medical institutes, promulgating national regulations, and producing professional codes of ethics for public medical personnel. The MOH is also responsible for international issues, such as those pertinent to for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eign companies and governments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Drug Administration Laws and Regulations
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The China Drug Administration Law and related regulations provide the legal framework for the establishment of pharmaceutical manufacturing enterprises, and pharmaceutical trading enterprises, and for the administration of pharmaceutical products, including the development and manufacturing of new drugs, the import of pharmaceuticals and the regulation of packaging, trademarking and advertising of ph
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	armaceutical products in China.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Permits and Licenses for Importation, Manufacturing and Registration of Drugs
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Imported Drug License.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our strategy to date has been to seek approval for the import into China of drugs approved in other markets. We must obtain an Imported Drug License from the CFDA to import a phar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	maceutical product into China.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	To qualify to receive an Imported Drug License from the CFDA, each manufacturing establishment must be registered with the FDA or European (&#x201C;EMA&#x201D;) regulatory authorities where the product is registered for sale and listed on the Certificate of Pharmaceutical Product (&#x201C;CPP&#x201D; or Country of Origin Approval). In general, the CFDA also requires that an imported drug must also have country of origin approval for the same indication for which an Imported Drug License is applied
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As a result, in order to obtain and maintain an Imported Drug License in China, we or our partners must also meet the regulatory requirements for the country of origin of the pharmaceutical products we import, or are s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eeking to import, into China.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The process for applying for and obtaining an Imported Drug License can be protracted and uncertain. In addition to the submission of clinical data from trials outside China, the CFDA may require additional clinical data, including from studies in China, and it may conduct its own inspection and testing of manufacturing facilities and of finished product. An Imported Drug License needs to be renewed every five years. Further, if the manufacturer of the pharmaceutical product changes, an additional approval is required from the CFDA, and approval will also have to be obtained in the country from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	which the product is imported.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For ZADAXIN, the CPP is in Italy, and was issued by the AIFA. The named manufacturer of ZADAXIN is Patheon Italia S.p.A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	DC Bead is manufactured by Biocompatibles UK Ltd. and its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Country of Origin approval is the United Kingdom
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	We and our partners need to maintain these approvals.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	China requires that products with an Imported Drug License be imported through approved importing agents. At each port of entry, prior to moving the product forward to the distributors, government-licensed importing agents must process and evaluate each shipment to determine whether such shipment satisfies China'
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s quality control requirements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	GMP Certificates.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;Our current products and our clinical candidates in China are all manufactured outside China and are subject to GMP standards in the country in which they are manufactured. Our manufacturers are subject to site inspections by the regulatory authorities in the jurisdictions in which they are located. The issuance and renewal of an Imported Drug License is dependent, among other things, upon maintaining manufacturing standards that comply with the GMP standards of a widely recognized regulatory authority, such as the FDA or EMEA.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If we were to manufacture product in China, or obtain product from Chinese contract manufacturers, such manufacturing would be subject to similar GMP standards established in China and admi
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	nistered by local authorities.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	11
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage12"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Distribution of Pharmaceutical Products
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	According to the China Drug Administration Law and related regulations, a manufacturer of pharmaceutical products in China can only engage in the trading of the pharmaceutical products that the manufacturer has produced itself. In addition, such manufacturer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	can only sell its products to:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	wholesalers and retailers holding pharmaceutical trading permits;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	other holders of pharmaceutical manufacturing permits; or
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:54PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-SIZE:10PT;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	medical practitioners holding medical practice permits.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A pharmaceutical manufacturer in China is prohibited from selling its products to end-users, or individuals or entities other than holders of Pharmaceutical Trading Permits, the pharmaceutical manufacturing permits o
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	r the medical practice permits.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A pharmaceutical distributor (including wholesalers and retailers) must satisfy requirements as to: personnel with pharmaceutical expertise, appropriate warehousing and sanitary environments compatible with the distributed pharmaceutical products; quality management and compliance with regulations to ensure the quality of the distributed pharmaceutical products. Operations of pharmaceutical distributors must be conducted in accordance with the Pharmaceutical Operation Quality Management Rules and require a certificate from the CFDA. Pharmaceutical distributors must comply with record-keeping requirements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	regarding the products sold.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Price Control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Prior to June 1, 2015, the price of pharmaceutical products in China was controlled and regula
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ted by the Chinese government.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The retail prices of pharmaceutical products included in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	National Essential Drug List
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and the National Basic Medical Insurance Drugs, Work-Related Injury Insurance Drugs and Maternity Insurance Drugs Catalogue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;Catalogue&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, as well as those pharmaceutical products whose production or distribution are deemed to constitute monopolies were subject to price controls in the form of f
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ixed prices or price ceilings.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The prices of medicines that were not subject to price controls were determined at the discretion of the respective pharmaceutical companies.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	With the promulgation of the Circular on Issuing the Opinions on Promoting Drug Price Reform jointly by the National Development and Reform Commission and several other government agencies (t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he &#x201C;Circular&#x201D;), starting from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	June
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015, pharmaceutical products (other than anesthetics and Class I psychotropic drugs which are still subject to fixed ex-factory price and retail ceiling price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	controls
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) are no longer subject to price cont
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	rols by the Chinese Government.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Since the Circular is very new, it is not clear how e
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	xactly it will be implemented.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Although most of the pharmaceutical products are no longer subject to fixed prices or price ceilings, the Chinese government could still influence the setting of the prices through the government bidding process and its management of the reimbursement system, as discussed below.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Reimbursement under the National Medical Insurance Program
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Ministry of Human Resources and Social Security (&#x201C;MOHRSS&#x201D;), together with other government authorities, determine which medicines are to be included in or removed from the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Catalogue for the National Medical Insurance Program, as well as the category under which a medicine should fall in the Catalogue. There are two categories under the Catalogue: Category A and Category B. Category
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	medicine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s are generally more expensive than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Category A medicine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A National Medical Insurance Program participant can be reimbursed for the full cost of a Category A medicine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	but only a certain percentage of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Category
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	medicine
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;Whether a medicine should be included in the Catalogue depends on a number of factors, including whether the medicine is used in large quantities and commonly prescribed, and whether it is considered to be important in meeting the basic healthcare needs of the general public.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Although the National Medical Insurance Program is designated as a national program, the implementation of the National Medical Insurance Program is delegated to various provincial governments, each of which has established its own medicine catalog
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A provincial government must include all Category A medicines listed in the Catalogue in its provincial medicine catalog
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ue and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	may
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage13"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	not downgrade a nationally classified Category A medicine to Category B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;&nbsp;For
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Category
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	B
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	medicines
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	listed in the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Catalogue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, provincial governments have the discretion to add or subtract by no more than 15%
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The amount in a participant&#x2019;s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	individual medical insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	account varies, depending upon the amount of contributions from the participant and his or her employer.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Generally, program participants who are from relatively wealthier eastern parts of China and relatively wealthier metropolitan centers have greater amounts in their individual accounts than those from less developed provinces.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Government Procurement
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Most of the hospitals in China are State-owned.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	P
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	harmaceutical products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	covered by the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	National Medical Insurance Program are generally procured by the government through a tender process.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The tender process
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is typically conducted by the provincial health authorities every year or every few years. A government-appointed committee reviews bids submitted by pharmaceutical companies and selects one or more products for the treatment of a particular medical condition. The selection is based on a number of factors, including bid price, quality and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	manufacturer&#x2019;s reputation and service. Once a product is selected by the committee, the state-owned hospitals in the province will purchase the product at the tender price submitted by the pharmaceutical company. However, starting from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	February
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015, the State Council had encouraged hospitals
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in some pilot cities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to renegotiate the supply price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of the product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	selected to further drive down the price.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Healthcare Reform
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Chinese government is undertaking a major reform of its
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	medical insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	system. The MOHRSS is responsible for the reform of the medical insurance system. At present,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the medical insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	system
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	consists of three basic medical insurances: (i) the Urban Employee Basic Medical Insurance Scheme,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which is a mandatory health insurance program for urban employees and retirees; (ii) the Urban
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Resident Basic Medical Insurance Scheme, which is a voluntary program for other urban residents;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and (iii) the New Rural Cooperative Medical Scheme, or NRCMS, which is a voluntary program for all
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	rural residents.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The coverage of China&#x2019;s urban/rural basic medical insurance extended from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	approximately 10% in 2004 to approximately 94% and 100% in 2009 and 2013, respectively. As of December 31, 2014, the two urban insurance schemes covered 597 million urban residents and the NRCMS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	covered approximately 736 million rural residents. In addition, the budget and actual amount of medical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and healthcare expenditure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	of the Ministry of Finance have been increasing since 2009, with both
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	exceeding 900 billion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Chinese Yuan Renminbi (&#x201C;RMB&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in 2014.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Our Challenges
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our ability to successfully commercialize our products in China as well as in other parts of the world depends in part on the extent to which coverage and reimbursement to patients will be available from government health care programs, private health insurers and other third-party payors or organizations, as well as on the level of reimbursement. Significant uncertainty exists as to the reimbursement status of therapeutic products, such as ZADAXIN or other drugs we may develop.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In most of the markets in which we are currently approved to sell ZADAXIN, reimbursement for ZADAXIN under government or private health insurance programs is not yet available. In many of these countries government resources and per capita income may be so low that our products would be prohibitively expensive and therefore will not be covered by government health insurance program.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In November 2009, thymalfasin, the generic chemical name for our pharmaceutical product ZADAXIN, was included as a Catego
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ry B product in the Catalogue.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	However, since the Catalogue is amended every two years, there is no assurance that ZADAXIN will remain on the Catalog
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ue with subsequent amendments.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Furthermore,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	since
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the provinces have the discretion to exclude Category B products in the Catalogue from the provincial catalogue within certain limit
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, t
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	here is no assurance that ZADAXIN will be included in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	all the provincial catalogues.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Even if ZADAXIN is included in the catalogue of a province, we may not be the successful bidder in the government bidding process.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	13
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage14"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	US, Europe and Other Countries
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The regulatory regime for the approval for drug distribution and marketing in the US and Europe is similar in many respects to the regulatory system in China. The steps required before a new drug may be distributed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	commercially generally include:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 6PT 39.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	conducting appropriate pre-clinical laboratory evaluations, including animal studies, in compliance with the FDA's Good Laboratory Practice (&#x201C;GLP&#x201D;) requirements, to assess the potential safety and efficacy of the product;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 6PT 39.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	submitting the results of these evaluations and tests to the FDA in an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Investigational New Drug Application (&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	IND
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and receiving approval from the FDA that the clinical studies proposed under the IND are allowed to proceed;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 6PT 39.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	conducting adequate and well-controlled clinical trials in compliance with the FDA's Good Clinical Practice (&#x201C;GCP&#x201D;) requirements that establish the safety and efficacy of the product candidate for the intended use, typically in the same Phase 1, Phase 2 and Phase 3 st
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	eps described above for China;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 6PT 39.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	development of manufacturing processes that conform to FDA current Good Manufacturing Practices, or cGMPs, as confirmed by FDA inspection;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 6PT 39.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	submitting to the FDA the results of pre-clinical studies, clinical studies, and adequate data on chemistry, manufacturing and control information to ensure reproducible product quality batch after batch, in a New Drug Application (&#x201C;NDA&#x201D;) or Biologics License Application (&#x201C;BLA&#x201D;); and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT 39.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2022;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 12PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	obtaining FDA approval of the NDA, including inspection and approval of the product manufacturing facility as compliant with cGMP requirements, prior to any commercial sale or shipme
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	nt of the pharmaceutical agent.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	After FDA approval has been obtained, the FDA requires post-marketing reporting to monitor the side effects of the drug. This may include phase 4 studies in which the drug is studied in an expanded patient population in a post-approval setting for continued monitoring of safety and sometimes continued efficacy.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We must comply with the regulations of each country in which we seek approval of and intend to market and sell any product.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	AGREEMENTS WITH THIRD PARTIES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We hold
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#0000FF;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	license, promotion, distribution or marketing agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with a number of parties for products currently marketed or under development, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	agreement with Biocompatibles UK Ltd (&#x201C;Biocompatible
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	s
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;) for the distribution of DC Bead
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	several
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	including the following significant agreements. We have additional license agreements with other parties.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage15"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Correvio LLC Agreement (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	acquired by Cardiome Pharma Corp.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	(&#x201C;Cardiome&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	in November 2013)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In December 2008,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	our subsidiary,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	NovaMed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (&#x201C;NovaMed&#x201D;),
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	entered into a licensing and distribution agreement with Correvio LLC for the distribution of Aggrastat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in China.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In August 2015, Cardiome and NovaMed mutually agreed to end their collaboration for Aggrastat, resulting in the Company&#x2019;s obligation to return all rights to the product to Cardiome.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Zensun (Shanghai) Science &amp; Technology Co.,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Ltd
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	(&#x201C;Zensun&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In May 2013, our subsidiary, SciClone Pharmaceuticals International China Holding Ltd. (&#x201C;SciClone China&#x201D;), entere
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	d into an agreement with Zensun
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	granting SciClone China a license and the exclusive rights in China, Hong Kong and Macao to promote, market, distribute and sell Neucardin&#x2122;, a novel, first-in-class therapeutic drug for the treatment of patients with intermediate to advanced chronic heart failure (CHF). The agreement provides for the principal terms of the arrangement between SciClone China and Zensun, and the companies have agreed to negotiate a supplemental license and supply agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Taiwan Liposome Compan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	y
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	(&#x201C;TLC&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In June 2013,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	entered into an agreement with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	TLC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	granting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	us
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a license and the exclusive righ
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ts in China, Hong Kong and Macao
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to promote, market, distribute and sell ProFlow&#xAE; for the treatment of peripheral arterial disease (PAD) and other indications. The agreement provides for the principal terms of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	arrangement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	with
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	TLC, and in March 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	we
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	entered into a collaboration and license agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In November 2014, TLC was notified by the CFDA that ProFlow did not received clinical trial approval and TLC is in the process of appealing the decision.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Medicines Company Agreement.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;In December 2014, we entered into an agreement with The Medicines Company granting us a license and the exclusive rights in China to promote, market, distribute and sell two cardiovascular products:&nbsp;&nbsp;Angiomax&#xAE;, an anticoagulant indicated in certain patients undergoing percutaneous coronary intervention (PCI), and Cleviprex&#xAE;, a third-generation dihydropyridine calcium channel blocker for the reduction of blood pressure.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Theravance Biopharma, In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	c
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In May 2015, we entered into an agreement with Theravance Biopharma
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	granting us exclusive development and commercialization rights to VIBATIV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(telavancin) in China, as well as the Hong Kong SAR, the Macau SAR, Taiwan and Vietnam. Under the terms of the agreement Theravance Biopharma will sell to us all clinical and commercial product required
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to develop and commercialize VI
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	BATIV in China and our other licensed territories.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Our continued distribution of approved products depends upon the continuation of these agreements and the renewal of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the agreements upon expiration.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:INHERIT;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;TEXT-TRANSFORM:UPPERCASE;">
	Information about Segment and Geographic Revenue
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Additional information about segment and geographic revenue is set forth in Note
</FONT>

</FONT>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<A NAME="eolPage16"></A>
<EFX_RISK_FACTORS>
<A NAME="FIS_RISK_FACTORS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT 55.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -55.45PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Item 1A.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231X10K_HTM_RISK_FACTORS">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 25PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Risk Factors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	You should carefully consider the risks described below, in addition to the other information in this report on Form 10-K, before making an investment decision. Each of these risk factors could adversely affect our business, financial condition, and operating results as well as adversely affect the value of an investment in our common stock
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Our stock price may be volatile, and an investment in our stock could suffer a decline in value.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:COURIER NEW;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	Although we reported net income
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	29.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	25.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	million, $11.0 million, for the years ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	2013, respectively, we have experienced significant operating losses in the p
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	ast, and as of December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	, we had an accumulated deficit of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	approximately $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	118
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;">
	. If our operating expenses were to increase or if we were not able to increase or sustain revenue, we may not maintain profitability over the next 12 months.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The market price of our common stock has experienced, and may continue to experience, substantial volatility due to many factors, some of which we have no control over, including:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:21PT;">

</P>

<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">

</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	government regulatory action affecting our Company or our drug products or our competitors' drug products in China, the US and other foreign countries, including the effect of government initiatives in China, particularly the Chinese government&#x2019;s increasing regulation of the pharmaceutical industry through anti-corruption activities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	;
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Any acquisitions we may undertake involve a number of risks, and we may not realize all the anticipated benefits of an acquisition. We may acquire other companies or products that present risks similar to those stated above.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	We may enter into other company or product acquisition transactions in the future which could present
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	integration or other
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	risks similar to those stated above and may also cause us to:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE STYLE="WIDTH:100%;" CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0">
<TR>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:21PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:21PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" ALIGN="LEFT" STYLE="WIDTH: 18.00PT; DISPLAY: INLINE;">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;;">
	&#xB7;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;">
<P STYLE="WIDTH:0PT;WIDTH:0PT;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
</P>
</TD>
<TD ALIGN="LEFT" VALIGN="TOP">
<P STYLE="LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	issue common stock that would dilute our current shareholders&#x2019; percentage ownership;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<FONT STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;FONT-FAMILY:SYMBOL;FONT-SIZE:8PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9;;">
	&#xB7;
