<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage82"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#x2014; Licensing Agreements
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Theravance Biopharma, Inc. (&#x201C;Theravance Biopharma&#x201D;)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In May 2015, Theravance Biopharma granted the Company exclusive development and commercialization rights to VIBATIV
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(telavancin) in China, as well as the Hong Kong SAR, the Macau SAR, Taiwan and Vietnam, in exchange for upfront and regulatory milestone payments totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$6
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million. SciClone will be responsible for all aspects of development and commercialization in the partnered regions, including pre- and post-launch activities and product registration. Theravance Biopharma will sell to SciClone all clinical and commercial product required to develop and commercialize VIBATIV in China and the Company&#x2019;s other licensed territories.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	The Medicines Company
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In December 2014, the Company entered into a strategic partnership for two cardiovascular products in China. The partnership includes an agreement granting SciClone a license and the exclusive rights in China to promote two products of The Medicines Company including Angiomax
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(bivalirudin) for Injection for which a Phase 3 registration trial was completed in China and is currently under review by the China Food and Drug Administration for marketing approval, and Cleviprex
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(clevidipine) Injectable Emulsion, for which a clinical trial application (CTA) for China was filed in 2013. Under the terms of the agreement, SciClone will be responsible for all aspects of commercialization, including pre-and post-launch activities, for both products in the China market (excluding Hong Kong and Macao). SciClone has also agreed to participate in the China registration process for both products. Financial terms of the agreement, in addition to net sales royalties payable to The Medicines Company, include the following additional payments to The Medicines Company: an upfront payment; a product support services fee; and regulatory/commercial success milestone payments of up to an aggregate of $50.5 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Zensun
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On May 13, 2013, the Company, through a designated affiliate, entered into a framework agreement with Zensun for the exclusive promotion, marketing, distribution and sale of Neucardin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	TM
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in China, Hong Kong and Macao. Neucardin is a novel, first-in-class therapeutic for the treatment of patients with intermediate to advanced heart failure, for which a New Drug Application was submitted to and accepted for review by the China Food and Drug Administration (&#x201C;CFDA&#x201D;) in 2012. The China
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	ood and Drug Administration informed Zensun in 2014 that its Phase 2 clinical study data is insufficient, and has asked Zensun to submit a New Drug Application once the ongoing Phase 3 clinical study reaches its endpoints.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Zensun framework agreement provides the principal terms of the arrangement and the two parties have also entered into a supplemental license and supply agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Subject to certain conditions, the Company has agreed to make payments of up to $18.5 million to Zensun, consisting of an upfront payment amount and further amounts on the achievement of certain milestones, including the approval of a new drug application for Neucardin&#x2122;,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the granting of a manufacturing license, good manufacturing practices certificate and drug approval number in China. The Company has agreed under certain conditions to make milestone payments to Zensun of $10 million if approval is received for a new device to deliver Neucardin&#x2122; and up to $25 million if approval is received for the use of Neucardin&#x2122; in additional indications.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Zensun will be responsible for manufacture of the product and the Company has agreed to purchase the product exclusively from Zensun for the duration of the agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In addition, the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	agreed to provide a collateralized loan to Zensun of up to approximately $12.0 million. Refer to Note 6 &#x201C;Loans Receivable&#x201D; for further information on the loans to Zensun.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Taiwan Liposome Company (&#x201C;TLC&#x201D;)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In June 2013, the Company entered into an agreement with TLC granting the Company a license and the exclusive rights in China, Hong Kong and Macao to promote, market, distribute and sell ProFlow
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for the treatment of peripheral arterial disease (&#x201C;PAD&#x201D;) and other indications. Under the terms of the agreement, TLC will be responsible for the continued development, including potential clinical trials and regulatory activities, as well as the manufacture and supply of ProFlow, and the Company will be
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	82
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage83"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	responsible for all aspects of commercialization including pre-and post-launch activities.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In November 2014,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	TLC was notified by the CFDA that Pro
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Flow did not receive
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	clinical trial approval and TLC is in the process of appealing the decision.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The agreement provides for the principal terms of the arrangement between SciClone and TLC, and in March 2014, the companies entered into a collaboration and license agreement. Financial terms of the agreement include clinical and regulatory milestone payments and sales milestone payments up to an aggregate of $39.5 million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	For the years ended December 31,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2014 and 2013, the Company recorded upfront
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and milestone
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	payments totaling
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$7
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.5 million,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$11.0 million and $5.0 million, respectively, in research and development expense related to its licensing arrangements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 21.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 17 &#x2014;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Termination of Collaboration with Cardiome Pharma Corp. (&#x201C;Cardiome&#x201D;)
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In August 2015, Cardiome, from whom the Company licensed marketing and commercialization rights to the heart medication Aggrastat
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-SIZE:5PT;TOP:-4PT;POSITION:RELATIVE;LINE-HEIGHT:115%">
	&#xAE;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, and the Company mutually agreed to end their collaboration for Aggrastat and terminate the Company&#x2019;s exclusive distributorship in China for the product, resulting in the Company&#x2019;s obligation to return all rights to the product to Cardiome. The Company recorded Aggrastat revenues of $1.8 million, $1.1 million, and $0 million for the years ended December 31, 2015, 2014, and 2013, respectively, and the Company does not expect to generate any further Aggrastat revenues.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The terms of the agreement include up to $750,000 in transition payments to be received by the Company from Cardiome over approximately a one year period and require Cardiome to repurchase Aggrastat inventory held by the Company at its original purchase price. Transition payments in the amount of $
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	50,000 were collected from Cardiome during
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the second half of fiscal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2015 and were recorded as a credit to general and administrative expenses.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	During the fourth quarter of 2015, the Company received $1.1 million from Cardiome for repurchased inventory. The Company recorded the $1.1 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for reimbursement for inventory returned as a reduction in cost of product sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	since all of such inventory had previously been written down to zero.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	For the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	year ended December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	, 2015, the Company recorded a liability of $0.6 million, and a corresponding offset to revenue and cost of goods sold, related to Aggrastat product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	due to expire in mid-2016 that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	it expects to repurchase from its customer in connection with the termination of its agreement with Cardiome.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Under the terms of the agreement, Cardiome is not obliged to repurchase this inventory already sold to the Company&#x2019;s distributors. The Company does not expect to resell this inventory.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	18
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#x2014;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Contingencies
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Legal Matters
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The Company is a party to various legal proceedings and subject to government investigations, as noted in this section below. All legal proceedings and any government investigations are subject to inherent uncertainties, unfavorable rulings or other adverse events which could occur. Unfavorable outcomes could include substantial monetary damages or awards, injunctions or other remedies, and if any of these were to occur, the possibility exists for a material adverse impact on the Company&#x2019;s business, results of operations, financial position, and overall trends. The Company might also conclude that settling one or more such matters is in the best interests of its stockholders and its business, and any such settlement could include substantial payments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As previously disclosed, since 2010 the SEC and the US Department of Justice (&#x201C;DOJ&#x201D;)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	had
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	each been conducting formal investigations of the Company regarding a range of matters, including the possibility of violations of the Foreign Corrupt Practices Act (&#x201C;FCPA&#x201D;), primarily related to certain historical sales and marketing activities with respect to the Company&#x2019;s China operations. In response to these matters, the Company&#x2019;s Board appointed a Special Committee of independent directors (the &#x201C;Special Committee&#x201D;) to oversee its response to the government inquiry. Based on an initial review, the Special Committee decided to undertake an independent investigation as to matters reflected in and arising from the SEC and DOJ investigations in order to evaluate whether any violation of the FCPA or other laws occurred.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company previously recorded a charge to operating expenses in the fourth quarter of 2013 in the amount of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$2.0
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million for the accrual of an estimated loss associated with the SEC and DOJ investigations based on the available information at the time. In the second quarter of 2015, the Company recorded an additional charge to operating expenses of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$10.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million based on an agreement in principle reached with the SEC which had not yet been finalized, bringing the accrued liability to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	$12.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	million.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>

<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	83
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage84"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On October 7, 2015, the Company deposited
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	12.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in an interest-bearing escrow account that it established related to the agreement in principle regarding a proposed settlement of FCPA-related matters with the staff of the SEC, creating a cash restriction at the time of deposit.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On February
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	4
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 2016, the Company announced that it has entered into a settlement agreement with the SEC fully resolving the SEC&#x2019;s investigation into possible violations of the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FCPA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. Under the terms of the settlement agreement,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	in February 2016 the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	the SEC
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a total of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$12.8
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	which was released from its escrow account
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, including disgorgement, pre-judgment interest and a penalty
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as final settlement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. This payment is in line with the charges the Company previously recorded and disclosed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as summarized above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As part of the agreement the Company neither admitted nor denied engagement in any wrongdoing and the Company agreed to give status reports to the SEC for the next three years on its continued remediation and implementation of anti-corruption compliance measures. The DOJ has also completed its related investigation and has declined to pursue any action.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	NovaMed was a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	party to a Distribution and Supply Agreement with MEDA Pharma GmbH &amp; Co. KG (&#x201C;MEDA&#x201D;). Following the Company&#x2019;s acquisition of NovaMed, MEDA claimed it had a right to terminate the agreement under a change of control provision. NovaMed does not believe that MEDA had a right of termination under the agreement. NovaMed filed an application for binding arbitration with the China International Economic and Trade Arbitration Commission (&#x201C;CIETAC&#x201D;) on July 26, 2012. On April
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, 2014, CIETAC issued the final Award of the Arbitral Tribunal. The Arbitral Tribunal found that MEDA did have a right to terminate the agreement upon a change of control, but that MEDA must make reasonable reimbursement to NovaMed before any product rights are returned to MEDA.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	The amount that must be paid includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$333,333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	as &#x201C;unjust enrichment&#x201D; plus an amount for reasonable compensation for such services provided by NovaMed to MEDA. The amount of such payment for services was not determined by the Arbitral Tribunal, but was left to be determined by NovaMed. On April 30, 2014, NovaMed informed MEDA that its determination of reasonable compensation for its services was
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$3,314,629
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, including the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	$333,333
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	for unjust enrichment
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	MEDA made a counter offer and the parties were attempting to resolve the matter without an additional arbitration proceeding. In December 2014, NovaMed filed a &#x201C;Request for Second Arbitration&#x201D; with CIETAC in order to enforce its right to compensation. The arbitration case is pending with CIETAC and no hearing has taken place yet. The amount of any final payment to NovaMed remains uncertain, and as such the Company has not recognized it as a gain contingency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note 19 &#x2014;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Credit Facility
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 21.6PT 18PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	In December 2013, the Company&#x2019;s subsidiary, NovaMed Shanghai entered into a 10.0 million RMB revolving line of credit facility (approximately $1.6 million USD) and a maximum 15.0 million RMB loan facility (approximately $2.4 million USD) with Shanghai Pudong Development Bank Co. Ltd. (&#x201C;the Credit Facility&#x201D;) that was secured by its accounts receivable. The Credit Facility bore interest on borrowed funds at the People&#x2019;s Bank of China 6-month base rate plus 15% (6.44% in 2014 and 2013) on outstanding balances. The Credit Facility expired November 30, 2014, and all amounts borrowed were repaid by the expiration date. For the year ended December 31, 2014, the Company paid interest of approximately $48,000 related to the Credit Facility.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	Note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	20
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&#x2014; Segment Information and Geographic Data
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company reports segment information based on the internal reporting used by management for evaluating segment performance based on management&#x2019;s estimates of the appropriate allocation of resources to segments.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	T
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	he Company operates and manages its business primarily on a geographic basis. Accordingly, the Company determined its operating segments and reporting units, which are generally based on the nature and location of its customers, to be 1) China, and 2) Rest of the World, including the US and Hong Kong.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:5PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company evaluates the performance of its operating segments based on revenues and operating income (loss). Revenues for geographic segments are generally based on the location of customers. Operating income (loss) for each segment includes revenues, related cost of sales and operating expenses directly attributable to the segment. Operating income (loss) for each segment excludes non-operating income and expense.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	84
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;">
	For the Year Ended December 31,
</FONT>

<EFX_SUBSEQUENT_EVENTS>
<A NAME="FIS_SUBSEQUENT_EVENTS"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231X10K_HTM_SUBSEQUENT_EVENT">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	22
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2014; Subsequent Event
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	SEC Settlement and DOJ Investigation Update:
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	On February 4, 2016, the Company announced that it has entered into a settlement agreement with the SEC fully resolving the SEC&#x2019;s investigation into possible violations of the FCPA. Under the terms of the settlement agreement, in February 2016 the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	paid
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	total of $12.8 million
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, including disgorgement, pre-judgment interest and a penalty as final settlement that was released from its restricted escrow account funded in the fourth quarter of 2015. This payment is in line with the charges the Company previously recorded and disclosed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as further described in Note
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	18.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	As part of the agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company neither admitted nor denied engagement in any wrongdoing and the Company agreed to give status reports to the SEC for the next three years on its continued remediation and implementation of anti-corruption compliance measures. The DOJ has also completed its related investigation and has declined to pursue any action.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	86
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<HR SIZE="3" STYLE="COLOR:#999999" WIDTH="100%" ALIGN="CENTER">
</HR>
<P STYLE="PAGE-BREAK-AFTER:ALWAYS">
	&nbsp;
</P>
<A NAME="eolPage87"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Sinopharm
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	: &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective January 1, 2016, the Company&#x2019;s new contractual arrangement with its China
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	importer and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	distributor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	for ZADAXIN
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, Sinopharm, will result in the later recognition (relative to practices prevailing through December 31, 2015) of a portion of the Company&#x2019;s revenue invoiced to Sinopharm related to situations where the provincial tender price is greater relative to a referenced (baseline) tender price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This is due to a mechanism in the new contractual arrangement whereby the customer is invoiced at a lower base price relative to that prevailing in the previous agreement. The lower base price (as well as estimated price compensation payable due to the distributor for situations where the provincial tender price is lower than the referenced (baseline) tender price) will be recorded as revenue after the sale is completed. The distributor will then be invoiced for the portion of the price that may result from situations where the provincial tender price is greater than the referenced (baseline) tender price at a later time, and such amount will be recognized as revenue after the amount has been agreed to with the distributor.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This new arrangement may impact quarterly revenue amounts and timing, especially for the first quarter of 2016.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT 55.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -55.45PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT 55.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -55.45PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231X10K_HTM_ITEM_9">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Item&nbsp;9.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 34PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231X10K_HTM_CHANGES_DISAGREEMENTS_ACCOUNTANTS">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Changes in and Disagreements with Accountants on Accounting and Financial Disclosure
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:24.5PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	Not applicable.
</FONT>

</EFX_ACCOUNTING_CHANGES>
<EFX_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES>
<A NAME="FIS_CONTROL_AND_PROCEDURES"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 55.45PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -55.45PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Item&nbsp;9A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 31PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231X10K_HTM_CONTROLS_PROCEDURES">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Controls and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Procedure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	s
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Evaluation of Disclosure Controls and Procedur
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	es
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Disclosure controls and procedures are controls and other procedures that are designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed in our reports filed or submitted under the Securities Exchange Act of 1934, as amended, is recorded, processed, summarized and reported, within the time periods specified in the Securities and Exchange Commission&#x2019;s rules and forms. Disclosure controls and procedures include, without limitation, controls and procedures designed to ensure that information required to be disclosed in our reports filed under the Exchange Act is accumulated and communicated to management, including our President and Chief Executive Officer (&#x201C;CEO&#x201D;) and our Senior Vice President and Chief Financial Officer (&#x201C;CFO&#x201D;), as appropriate, to allow timely decisions regarding required disclosure. As of the end of the period covered by this report, management carried out an evaluation under the supervision and with the participation of the CEO
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the CFO of the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures in ensuring that material information required to be disclosed in the Company&#x2019;s reports filed or submitted under the Exchange Act, has been made known to them in a timely fashion. Based on this evaluation, the CEO and CFO concluded that the Company&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures ar
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	e effective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Management's Annual Report on Internal Control over Financial Reporting
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Management of the Company is responsible for establishing and maintaining adequate internal control over financial reporting as defined in Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f) under the Exchange Act. The Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting is designed to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles. The Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting includes those policies and procedures that (i)&nbsp;pertain to the maintenance of records that, in reasonable detail, accurately and fairly reflect the transactions and dispositions of the assets of the Company; (ii)&nbsp;provide reasonable assurance that transactions are recorded as necessary to permit preparation of financial statements in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles, and that receipts and expenditures of the Company are being made only in accordance with authorizations of management and directors of the Company; and (iii)&nbsp;provide reasonable assurance regarding prevention or timely detection of unauthorized acquisition, use or disposition of the Company&#x2019;s assets that could have a material effect on the consolidated financia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	l statements.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Because of its inherent limitations, internal control over financial reporting may not prevent or detect misstatements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#0000FF;DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;COLOR:#000000;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;">
	A control system, no matter how well conceived and operated, can provide only reasonable, not absolute, assurance that the objectives of the internal control system are met.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Also, projections of any evaluation of effectiveness to future periods are subject to the risk that controls may become inadequate because of changes in conditions, or that the degree of compliance with the policies or procedures may deteriorate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:9PT 0PT 12PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Under the supervision and with the participation of our management, we assessed the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eporting as of December 31, 201
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, based on the criteria set forth by the Committee of Sponsoring Organizations of the Treadway Commission (&#x201C;COSO&#x201D;) in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Internal Control-Integrated Framework
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2013
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	). Based on the results of our assessment,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	our management
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	concluded
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	that the Company maintained effective internal control over financial r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eporting as of December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	PricewaterhouseCoopers Zhong Tian LLP, an independent registered public accounting firm, has audited the effectiveness of the Company&#x2019;s internal control over financial r
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	eporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as of December 31, 2015
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as stated in their report, which is referenced in the index appearing under Item 8.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 6PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;">
	Changes in Internal Controls
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 18PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT:21.6PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Our management, including our CEO and CFO, has evaluated any changes in our internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the quarter ended December 31
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2015, and has concluded that there was no change during such quarter that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, our internal control over financial reporting.&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 6PT 55.05PT;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;TEXT-INDENT: -55.1PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
</P>
<P>

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

	ers

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

	and ending December 31, 2015, which sales are made under the 2013 Re-Exportation Agreement

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.&nbsp;&nbsp;CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT ARE DESIGNATED BY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].&nbsp;&nbsp;A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:-18PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	a.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 10.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If any other province in the Territory est
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ablishes a new tender
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	price level
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	CNY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] per vial of Product before December 31, 2015 and if as a result of such new tender price Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s margin on Product sales during the remainder of the Initial Term of the 2013 Re-Exportation Agreement in such province falls
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], then SPIL shall pay Importer for vials of such Product sold at such lower price, with the amount of such payment by SPIL to be calculated to maintain Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s margin on Product sales in such province at [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] margin.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:8PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	b.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If any other province in the Territory establishes a new tender price level below CNY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] per vial of Product before December 31, 2015 and if as a result of such new tender price Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s margin on Product sales during the remainder of the Initial Term of the 2013 Re-Exportation Agreement in such province rises
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	above
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], then Importer shall pay SPIL for vials of such Product sold at such higher price, with the amount of such payment by Importer to be calculated to maintain Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s margin on Product sales in such province at [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] margin.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:-18PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each party shall also compensate the other party for Product vials (importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s inventories on December 31, 2015) sold under the 2016 Import Agreement during the period from
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	until
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at the same level per vial of Product as determined in paragraph 1 and 2
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:-18PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The above payments from SPIL may, at SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s discretion, be made in the form of credit notes that Importer can off-set against Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s accounts receivable with SPIL under the 2016 Import Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -18PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:-18PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Under the 2013 Re-Exportation Agreement, Importer shall purchase through Re-Exporter from SPIL in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at least [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] vials of Product.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Except as supplemented above, the 2016 Import Agreement remain in full effect and enforceable according to their terms
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Letter in counterparts, each of which shall be deemed an original and all of which together shall constitute one instrument
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Agreement may be executed
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Sincerely,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].&nbsp;&nbsp;A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	IMPORT AND DISTRIBUTION AGREEMENT
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	This Import and Distribution Agreement (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	) is made effective as of the 1st day of January, 2016 (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Effective Date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	), by and between SciClone Pharmaceuticals International China Holding Ltd., an exempted company incorporated under the laws of Cayman Islands, having its principal place of business at P.O. Box 309GT, Ugland House, South Church Street, George Town, Grand Cayman, Cayman Islands, British West Indies (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	) and Sinopharm Holding Lingyun Biopharmaceutical (Shanghai) Co. Limited, a company incorporated under the laws of the People
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s Republic of China having its principal place of business at RM 1903, No. 175, East Yan
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	an Road, Huangpu District, Shanghai (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	SPIL and Importer are referred to in this Agreement individually as a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and collectively as the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	Parties
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	BACKGROUND
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	A.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL has rights to a product known as Thymalfasin for Injection (Zadaxin&#xAE;);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	B.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer is a business operating in People
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Republic of China with expertise in the import and distribution of pharmaceutical products, having the command of sufficient market resources, and in the supply of such products to the dealers after importing such products to the People
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Republic of China;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	C.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL desires to engage Importer to import one or more pharmaceutical products into the Territory for the sole purpose of further distributing such product(s) solely in the People
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Republic of China in a manner consistent with maintaining SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s reputation and business interests, all in accordance with the terms and conditions of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	NOW THEREFORE, for and in consideration of the covenants, conditions, and undertakings hereinafter set forth, it is agreed by and among the Parties as follows:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	DEFINITIONS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The terms in this Agreement with initial letters capitalized shall have the meanings set forth below, or the meaning as designated in the indicated places throughout this Agreement:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Affiliate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means, with respect to a Party, any Entity that controls, is controlled by, or is under common control with that Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For the purpose of this definition,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	control
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means direct or indirect ownership of more than fifty percent (50%) of the shares of stock entitled to vote for the election of directors, in the case of a corporation, or more than fifty percent (50%) of the equity interest in the case of any other type of legal entity, status as a general partner in any partnership, or any other arrangement whereby the Entity controls or has the right to control the board of directors or equivalent governing body of a corporation or other
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>

	&#x201C;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Government Authority
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means any federal, state, national, regional, provincial or local government, or political subdivision thereof, or any multinational organization or any authority, agency or commission entitled to exercise any administrative, executive, judicial, legislative, police, regulatory or taxing authority or power, any court or tribunal (or any department, bureau or division thereof, or any governmental arbitrator or arbitral body).
</FONT>
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	TIS
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Total Importer Sales
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means the quantity of all Products sold by Importer in the Territory during a specified period, including all sales of Products to Tier-two Distributors, hospitals and all retail sales of Products during such period, as determined in good faith by SPIL or its third party designee.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	APPOINTMENTS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Appointment of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL hereby appoints Importer as an importer and distributor of Products in the Territory, and Importer hereby accepts such appointment, subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such appointment shall be exclusive during
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(as defined in Section 11.1)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, SPIL shall not engage in or authorize any third party to engage in the same business in the Territory in a manner that would conflict with the rights granted to Importer under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s sole right with respect to the Products is to import Products directly to the Territory and sell such Product to hospitals, pharmacy and Tier-Two Distributors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall accept orders from hospitals, pharmacy and Tier-Two Distributors and ship the corresponding Product in accordance with the agreements between Importer and the respective hospitals, pharmacy and Tier-Two Distributors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	WEST\268167869.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	3
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:455.40PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;WIDTH:455.40PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT ARE DESIGNATED BY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	use any third parties, other than with respect to the physical transportation of Products, to conduct its obligations under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer is not authorized to, and shall not, do business in SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s name or hold itself out as SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s agent for the import, distribution or sales of the Products or as being entitled to bind or obligate SPIL in any way
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Except as expressly permitted under this Section 2.1, Importer shall not sell or offer to sell any Products.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Subject to applicable laws and regulations, Importer shall not export, import or distribute Products to or in any country, province, region or territory outside the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not actively promote, market, advertise, stimulate interest in, or solicit orders for Products from outside the Territory, including but not limited to, by establishing any Branch or maintaining any distribution depot for the Products outside of the Territory except with SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s prior written consent in its sole discretion
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall promptly refer all inquiries concerning the purchase of Products for use outside the Territory to SPIL.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Independent Contractors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The relationship between SPIL and Importer established by this Agreement is that of independent contractors, and nothing contained in this Agreement shall be construed (i) to give any Party the power to direct or control the day to-day activities of any other Party or (ii) to constitute the Parties as partners, joint venturers, co-owners or otherwise as participants in a joint or common undertaking
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All financial obligations associated with Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s business are the sole responsibility of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All agreements between Importer and any Tier-Two Distributor are Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s exclusive responsibility and shall not affect the obligations of SPIL or Importer under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Competing Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer agrees that any efforts by it to import or distribute or sell Competing Products to or within the Territory would constitute a conflict of interest with respect to Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s obligations to SPIL to import or distribute the Products to or in the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For each Product, the competing product(s) are listed on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(each such product, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Competing Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall have the right, upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	written notice, to reasonably amend
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit D
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to include reasonable additional products as Competing Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During the Term, Importer shall not import or distribute or sell any Competing Product in the Territory.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.5
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Reservation of Rights
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Except as expressly provided in this Article 2, no right, title, or interest is granted, whether express or implied, by SPIL to Importer, and nothing in this Agreement shall be deemed to grant to Importer rights in any products or technology other than the Products, nor shall any provision of this Agreement be deemed to restrict SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s right to exploit the technology or other intellectual property rights relating to the Products in products other than the Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer acknowledge and agree that SPIL has and retains the right to appoint other authorized exporters, importers, distributors or resellers of the Products outside the Territory without restriction and without any obligations to Importer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	OBLIGATIONS OF SPIL
</FONT>
</FONT>

	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
