<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Supply of Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Subject to the terms and conditions of this Agreement, SPIL shall provide Product to the Importer or its designee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall use [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] efforts to ship Product to the Importer or its designee within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after SPIL accepts a Purchase Order for such Product pursuant to Section 4.2(b)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All such Product shall, at the time of delivery, have a remaining shelf-life of at least the minimum shelf-life for such Product as set forth on Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Neither Importer nor its designee shall have any right to return or otherwise receive any credit for expired Product that had such minimum shelf-life at the time such Product was delivered by SPIL as required by this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Documentation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall provide Importer documents in SPIL&#x2019;s possession or control that (i) are required by Law for the import of the Product into the Territory, or (ii) are requested in writing by Importer and are reasonably related to Importer's ability to fulfill its obligations under this Agreement, including certificates of origin, content lists, product descriptions and material safety data sheets (collectively, the &#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Product Documentation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Safety Updates
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall promptly provide Importer with new information of which SPIL becomes aware concerning the efficacy or safety of any Product.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Product Changes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL may change the Products, or their packaging or Product Documentation, as follows
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) at any time immediately upon written notice to Importer if such changes are, in SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s sole good faith judgment, required by Law, and (ii) for any reason upon [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days advance written notice to Importer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.5
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Shipping of Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Unless otherwise agreed by all Parties in writing, SPIL shall package and ship Products CIP (Carriage Insurance Paid) the point of delivery designated in the applicable Purchase Order (Incoterms 2010) in accordance with applicable Laws, including quality control regulations and further including the laws and regulations of the People
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Republic of China applicable to the importation of the Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each Product shipment shall include (i) applicable Product Documentation for such Product, including product codes, quantities, batch numbers and expiration dates of such Product, and (ii) an invoice identifying such Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall arrange for shipment and shipping insurance of the Products at the cost
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All CHINA duties and customs fees in connection with such shipment shall be paid by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.6
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Title and Risk of Loss
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Title and risk of loss for each Product shall transfer to Importer when SPIL delivers such Product to Importer through the carrier for shipment pursuant to Section 3.5.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	3.7
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Anti-Corruption Training
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL may, at its option, provide
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	training related to the anti-corruption obligations described in Section 9.3 to employees and consultants of Importer and Tier-Two Distributors, including with regards to SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s code of conduct.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;WIDTH:455.40PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT ARE DESIGNATED BY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	OBLIGATIONS OF IMPORTER
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Limited Rights of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2018;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s sole right with respect to the Products is to (i) import such Products into the Territory and (ii) distribute such Products to the Tier-Two Distributors under Tier-Two Agreements for sale and use in the Territory and (iii) sell such Products to pharmacy and hospitals in the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer will not use any third parties, other than with respect to physical transportation and inspection of Products, to conduct its obligations under this Agreement or any Tier-Two Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer is not authorized to, and will not, do business in SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s name or hold itself out as SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s agent for the import, distribution or sales of the Products or as being entitled to bind or obligate SPIL in any way
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not distribute Products to (A) any Entity other than to hospitals, pharmacy and Tier-Two Distributors, and (B) to any country, province or region outside of the Territory.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Ordering of Products by Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall order Products from SPIL for delivery pursuant to Section 3.5 in quantities and on a schedule that will enable Importer to meet hospitals
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and Tier-Two Distributors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	requirements for Products, in each case pursuant to this Section 4.2
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of each year preceding each calendar year (also a budget year) during the Term, Importer and SPIL shall jointly review and agree in writing, no later than
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, on a budget for purchase of the Products by Importer during the following calendar year (the budget year)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Prior to the Effective Date, Importer and SPIL shall jointly review and agree in writing the budget for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All budgets shall be in substantially the same form as Exhibit E
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each such annual budget shall include required amounts of Products that Importer must order from SPIL for that calendar year in total and during each quarter of that year;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	provided, however
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, that SPIL shall not require in any such future budget (including the budget
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) that Importer maintain Product inventory of greater than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] months Total Importer Sales (TIS)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For clarity with respect to such future budgets, Importer must purchase Product in quantities that comply with the budget up to [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] months TIS, but cannot be required to purchase Products in quantities that exceed such amounts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the parties do not agree on a budget by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or if Importer does not order the amounts required by a budget for any particular quarter or year, then SPIL shall be entitled, in its sole discretion, to terminate the exclusivity of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights to import into the Territory or any portion thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	upon written notice to Importer, on which date Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights shall become non-exclusive in the Territory or portion thereof, as set forth in such notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	At SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s request, Importer shall also provide SPIL proposed sales plans for the subsequent [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] months for each Product, and the Parties shall review and mutually agree on such plans
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The parties agree that, if the Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2018;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s product inventory (TIS) is more than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] months and Importer is in compliance with the obligations agreed in Section 5.1, then SPIL shall not unilaterally terminate the exclusive rights of Importer under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For each such order, Importer shall send SPIL, to the facsimile number set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, a written purchase order in a form to be agreed by the Parties that sets forth the identity and quantity of Product and the requested delivery schedule and destination for each
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	such Product (each, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If the Purchase Order conforms to the terms and conditions of this Agreement and SPIL accepts such Purchase Order, then SPIL shall confirm receipt and acceptance of such Purchase Order by written notice to Importer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding any language to the contrary herein, Importer shall place firm Purchase Orders for
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	not later than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

	, to allow sufficient time for shipment by SPIL of all Product ordered in such Purchase Orders before the end of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	].
</FONT>

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Customs
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] shall be solely responsible for obtaining customs clearance for Products, provided that [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] shall provide reasonable assistance to [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] in obtaining such customs clearance.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Delivery of Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All Parties hereby agree that the Products shall be deemed as having been delivered to Importer when SPIL delivers the shipping documents of the Products to Importer and directly ships the Products, by air, to a location in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	specified by the Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL and Importer shall work together, in a manner that is customary in the pharmaceutical industry, to obtain customs clearance and inspection of Products.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.5
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inspection of Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer or its designee shall inspect each Product delivered under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall notify SPIL in writing in any of the following cases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) Importer or its designee within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after Product is received by Importer or its designee of any such Product that is damaged or that does not conform to the Specifications or have the minimum remaining shelf-life at the time of delivery as set forth in Section 3.1, and (ii) of any Product that is rejected for any reason by any Government Authority during the importation process, including by provincial or municipal drug testing institutes that inspect Product in the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer or its designee shall provide, to the extent available, to SPIL or its designee, a detailed written description of such damage, lack of conformity or basis for rejection within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days of discovering such damage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For each Product that is damaged or non-conforming at the time of delivery by SPIL or is rejected before customs clearance by a Government Authority in the Territory, Importer or its designee shall, at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	option and at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	cost, either (i) return such Product to SPIL or its designee, or (ii) destroy such Product and provide SPIL a written certification of such destruction
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall replace each such Product that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	determines or agrees to have been damaged or non-conforming at the time such Product was delivered by SPIL pursuant to this Agreement, or that was rejected by a Government Authority before customs clearance in the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall have no obligation under this Agreement to refund any amounts paid for such damaged or non-conforming Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be responsible for harm caused to a third party by damaged or non-conforming Product only if and to the extent (i) such damage or non-conformity was present at the time SPIL
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	delivered such Product, and (ii) Importer or its designee inspected such Product as required by this Section 4.5 but such damage or non-conformity was not discoverable upon a diligent inspection and was not actually discovered by Importer or its designee nor by any Tier-Two Distributor.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.6
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Payment by Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Payment of Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For each unit of Product that SPIL delivers to Importer or its designee, Importer shall pay SPIL an amount equal to the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(subject to adjustment pursuant to Section 4.6(b))
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer acknowledges that this Importer Price reflects Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s status as exclusive importer and distributor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such payment obligations shall become due and payable [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after the end of the respective
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in which SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s invoice for such Products provided pursuant to Section 3.5 was issued and dated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall make such payment by T/T in immediately available funds to the account set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit F
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, as may be amended by SPIL in its sole discretion from time-to-time by written notice to Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All payments to SPIL under this Agreement shall be made in United States Dollars at the then current Standard Exchange Rate (subject to exchange rate adjustment pursuant to Section 4.6(b)).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exchange Rate Adjustments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer Price established on the Effective Date as set forth on Exhibit A is based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	per vial converted into United States Dollars using the CNY-USD
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] exchange rate of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Should the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] exchange rate published on the Effective Date by the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] on its website (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effective Date Rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) be different than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] then on the Effective Date the Parties shall recalculate the Importer Price in United States Dollars based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	per vial using such Effective Date Rate (such rate as of the Effective Date as used to determine the Importer Price set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the initial
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Standard Exchange Rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] website lists exchange rates for each
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	day at the following universal
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	resource locator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	] Exchange Rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, the Importer Price may be adjusted if, on [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] or [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of a calendar year during the Term, the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] Exchange Rate on such day is less than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] or more than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of the then-applicable Standard Exchange Rate (each such date an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exchange Rate Change Day
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In such event, either Party may, within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days of the Exchange Rate Change Day, notify the other Party in writing of such fact (each such notice, an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exchange Rate Change Notice
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) and, within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after delivery of such Exchange Rate Change Notice, the Parties shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) adjust the Standard Exchange Rate to equal the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] Exchange Rate published on the Exchange Rate Change Day; and (ii) recalculate the Importer Price in United States Dollars based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	per vial using such adjusted Standard Exchange Rate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Examples of such adjustments to the Standard Exchange Rate and resulting changes to the Importer Price are set forth in
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit G
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The adjusted Standard Exchange Rate shall apply to all payments made by Importer pursuant to each invoice issued by SPIL on or after the Exchange Rate Change Day
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In addition, the Standard Exchange Rate shall be adjusted on [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] and [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	during the
</FONT>

<P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Term to the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] Exchange Rate published on that date
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Following such adjustment, the Importer Price will be recalculated as described in clause (ii) above.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Price Reconciliation Due to Change in Tender Prices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Parties acknowledge and agree that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) the Importer Price set forth on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit A
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	is established using a tender price of CNY
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] as determined before the Effective Date by the province of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Reference Tender Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) such that Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of Product, after payment of the Importer Price and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and anticipated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	incurred in selling such Product is estimated to be [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	); and (ii) the Parties wish to establish a mechanism, as set forth in this Section 4.6(c) by which, if any province in the Territory establishes a tender price that is different from the Reference Tender Price (such different tender price, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Actual Tender Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), then the Parties will issue credit notes or make payments in amounts necessary to eliminate any change to Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin in such province that is caused solely by tender prices that are different from the Reference Tender Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For clarity, no such credit notes or payments will be made under this Section 4.6(c) if Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin changes for any reason other than a tender price that is different from the Reference Tender Price
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In order to make the foregoing adjustments, within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	during the Term, Importer shall provide SPIL with a written report setting forth, on a province-by-province basis (excluding sales to hospitals/pharmacies in [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]), the Actual Tender Price applicable to Product sales in such province during such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, and a calculation of any increase or decrease in Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin with respect to such Product sales that was caused solely by a difference between such Actual Tender Price and the Reference Tender Price (such increase or decrease in Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Margin Adjustment Amount
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), together with reasonable documentation thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin decreased solely because of a difference between such Actual Tender Price and the Reference Tender Price, then SPIL shall issue a credit note to Importer equal to such Margin Adjustment Amount and applicable to the payment of the Importer Price under Section 4.6(a) for Product sales in the next calendar quarter
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Margin
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	increased
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	solely because of a difference between such Actual Tender Price and the Reference Tender Price, then Importer shall pay SPIL an amount equal to such Margin Adjustment Amount together with the next scheduled payment of Importer Price under Section 4.6(a).
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Late Payments
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If SPIL does not receive payment of any sum due to it on or before the due date for such amount, then
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	interest shall thereafter accrue on the sum due to SPIL from the due date until the date of payment at a rate of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] or the maximum rate allowable by applicable Law, whichever is less.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.7
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer and their designee, as applicable, shall store all Products in secure facilities solely in the Territory or, upon SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s prior written consent at its sole discretion, at a facility outside the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such storage shall conform to applicable Law and Regulations, the Specifications and SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s guidelines in order to preserve the shelf-life of the Products and prevent spoilage, including, as applicable, requirements for cold storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">

	shall not tamper with or modify the Products, their packaging or the Product Documentation, and shall use

	efforts to prevent others from doing so.

</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.8
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inspection of Facilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall have the right, upon reasonable notice and during normal business hours, to inspect (i) Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s place of business and records, and all facilities in which Products are being stored by or on behalf of Importer, as applicable, for the purpose of determining that Importer is complying with its obligations under this Agreement, and (ii) require Importer to inspect, or at SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s option to permit and arrange for SPIL or its representative to inspect, any Tier-Two Distributor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s place of business and records, and all facilities in which Products are being stored by or on behalf of such Tier-Two Distributor, for the purpose of determining that such Tier-Two Distributor is complying with its obligations under the applicable Tier-Two Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.9
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Resources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In order to fulfill Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s obligations under this Agreement, Importer shall, at its sole cost and expense, at all times during the Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) employ the necessary and qualified staff; (ii) maintain appropriate facilities; and (iii) implement appropriate processes.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.10
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Product Recall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall maintain records of distribution of Products that accurately track the location and distribution of all Products to the Tier-Two Distributors by
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s request, Importer shall provide SPIL with access to such records in the event of a Product recall or other quality-related issue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the event of a recall by SPIL of any of the Products, Importer shall co-operate fully with SPIL and take all reasonable actions to secure the recovery from the Tier-Two Distributor of recalled Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding anything in this Agreement to the contrary, this Section 4.10 shall remain in effect for a period of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] after the expiration or termination of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.11
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Coordination with Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	At SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s request, Importer shall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) exercise its rights under any Tier-Two Agreement or agreement with hospitals relating to the supply of the Product; (ii) notify Tier-Two Distributors of any information received from SPIL that is applicable to the Products, including their use or sale, or that SPIL requests be provided to Tier-Two Distributors; and (iii) coordinate meetings and communications between or among SPIL, Importer and the applicable Tier-Two Distributor in order to facilitate the safe and proper distribution of Product in the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In addition, within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] after the Effective Date, Importer shall provide SPIL a list of all potential acceptable Tier-Two Distributors in every province in the Territory, which list (and any subsequent change thereto) shall be composed of distributors that have been selected based on the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] before any distribution of Product to such Tier-Two Distributors (such list, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Approved Distributor List
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Approved Distributor List shall be reviewed and re-approved [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] between SPIL and Importer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.12
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall be responsible, at its expense, for obtaining and maintaining all Licenses for the importation and distribution of the Products and the conduct of its business operations in accordance with this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.13
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Business Conduct
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall conduct its business in a manner that reflects favorably at all times on the Products and the good name, goodwill and reputation of SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, Importer shall (i) not engage in or permit any deception, misleading or unethical practices that are or might be detrimental to SPIL or the public, including but not limited to disparagement of SPIL or the Products; (ii) not publish or employ, or cooperate in the publication or employment of any misleading or deceptive advertising material, and (iii) not make any representations, warranties or guarantees with respect to the Specifications, features or capabilities of the Products that are not consistent with the Product Documentation accompanying the Products.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	DISTRIBUTION OF PRODUCTS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inventory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	during the Term, Importer will plan to, and use diligent efforts to, maintain in the Territory an inventory of each Product within a range calculated as follows
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of such Product during the immediately preceding [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] divided by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] (such quantity,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and multiplied by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] (for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the range and [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] (for the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	of the range) (such quantity range, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Target Inventory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), provided, however, that
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(A) Importer will manage the overall quantity of Target Inventory such that Tier-Two Distributors will have inventory of Product no less than the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	multiplied by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], with the balance of the Target Inventory located in a warehouse of the Importer; and (B) the Importer will maintain an inventory of each Product in Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s warehouse equal to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	times the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] after any request by SPIL, Importer will provide SPIL a detailed, accurate and complete written report of the current inventory of each Product held by the Importer and each Tier-Two Distributor, including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and other information reasonably requested by SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall calculate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	in good faith based on information provided by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	An example of such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	calculation is set forth on Exhibit E.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Resources
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In order to fulfill Importer&#x2019;s obligations under this Agreement Importer will, at its sole cost and expense, at all times during the Term:&nbsp;&nbsp;(i) employ the necessary and qualified staff; (ii) maintain appropriate facilities reasonably necessary for Importer&#x2019;s performance of its obligations under this Agreement; and (iii) implement appropriate processes for Importer's performance of its obligations under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tier-Two Distributors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not enter into any agreement for, nor otherwise permit or enable, the distribution or sale of Products by any third party except for the third party distributors identified on the then-applicable Approved Distributor List in accordance with Section 4.11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For each third party distributor on the Approved Distributor List that Importer wishes to engage to distribute or sell Products, Importer shall enter into a written
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	WEST\268167869.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	11
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
</FONT>
</P>
