<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	agreement for the distribution and sale of Products by such third party distributor that includes all of the terms and conditions set forth in Section 5.4 (each such agreement a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tier-Two Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, and each such distributor that is a counterparty to such Tier-Two Agreement, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Tier-Two Distributor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall provide SPIL a complete, accurate, fully-executed copy of each Tier-Two Agreement within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after the date such Tier-Two Agreement becomes effective; provided that prior to entering into any Tier-Two Agreement with a Tier-Two Distributor, Importer shall provide SPIL with a copy of such Tier-Two Distributor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s business Licenses, tax registration License and class three medical device Licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL shall issue any authorization letters required by an applicable regulatory authority for the importation and sale of Product under this Agreement to each Tier-Two Distributor.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Terms for Inclusion in the Tier-Two Agreements
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer shall use
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	efforts to include in the Tier-Two Agreement the following terms and conditions:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The corresponding Tier-Two Distributor shall solely distribute Product in the Territory, and shall not distribute Product outside of the Territory.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Competing Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The corresponding Tier-Two Distributor shall not import or distribute any Competing Product (as defined in this Agreement) in the Territory.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Ordering and Importation of Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The corresponding Tier-Two Distributor shall order Product solely from Importer
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inspection of Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The corresponding Tier-Two Distributor shall inspect each Product it receives
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such Tier-Two Distributor shall notify Importer of any Product that is damaged or that does not conform to the Specifications within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days after such Tier-Two Distributor receives such Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such Tier-Two Distributor shall not refuse Product for any reasons other than damage or non-conformity to the Specifications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For purposes of clarity, such Tier-Two Distributor shall not refuse any order because of the quantity of Products included in the shipment.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	During the period between the corresponding Tier-Two Distributor
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s receipt of Products and the delivery of such Products to the end-users, the Tier-Two Distributor will store all Products in secure facilities solely in the Territory unless otherwise approved in writing by Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such storage will conform to applicable Law and Regulations, the Specifications and Product guidelines in order to preserve the shelf-life of the Products and prevent spoilage, including, as applicable, requirements for cold storage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer will not tamper with or modify the Products, their packaging or the Product Documentation.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:25PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inspection of Facilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer or its designee will have the right, upon reasonable notice and during normal business hours, to inspect the corresponding Tier-Two
</FONT>
</FONT>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

	Third-Party Beneficiary

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL will be an intended third-party beneficiary of the Tier-Two Agreement, and SPIL will be entitled, to the maximum extent permitted by Law, to enforce Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights under the Tier-Two Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(p)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Governing Law; Dispute Resolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Tier-Two Agreement will be construed and determined in accordance with the laws of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	].
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(q)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Other Terms and Conditions
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Tier-Two Agreement will contain other terms and conditions consistent with this Agreement and consistent with custom in the industry, including representations and warranties and indemnity.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.5
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Amendments of Tier-Two Agreement; Notices
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not modify or amend the Tier-Two Agreement, nor waive any of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights under the Tier-Two Agreement, without providing at least [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] prior written notice to SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall provide SPIL copies of any notices received by Importer pursuant to the Tier-Two Agreement within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of such receipt by Importer, and shall discuss with SPIL all requests received by Importer to approve or consent to any actions related to the Tier-Two Agreement before making any decision regarding such requests.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.6
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Distribution to Tier-Two Distributors
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not appoint, or transfer any Product to, any Tier-Two Distributor unless such Tier-Two Distributor is on the Approved Distributor List.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.7
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Price Approval
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer will use diligent efforts to (i) obtain and maintain price approval from Government Authorities in the Territory, and (ii) ensure that appropriate Tier-Two Distributors participate in applicable tender systems to enable sales of Products in the Territory
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	At SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s request, Importer will cooperate in connection with such efforts.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.8
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Product Recall
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer will maintain records of distribution of Products that will accurately track the location and distribution of all Products to Tier-Two Distributors by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], and will require each Tier-Two Distributor to accurately track the location and distribution of all Products to end users, by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s request, Importer will provide SPIL, and require each Tier-Two Distributor to provide SPIL, with access to such records in the event of a Product recall or other quality-related issue
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the event of a recall by SPIL of any of the Products, Importer will co-operate fully with SPIL and take all reasonable actions to secure the recovery from each Tier-Two Distributor of recalled Product
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The obligations set forth in this Section 5.8 will remain in effect for a period of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] after the expiration or termination of this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	5.9
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Adverse Event Reporting
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer will report to SPIL and all adverse Product events and other deficiencies within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of acquiring knowledge of such events
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, Importer will report to SPIL adverse events associated with a death or serious injury within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s knowledge of such event to enable SPIL to comply with any relevant regulatory reporting requirements.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6.
</FONT>
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	REPRESENTATIONS AND WARRANTIES; DISCLAIMERS
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6.1
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

	it has the full right, power and authority to enter into the Agreement, to perform its obligations hereunder; and

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement has been duly executed by it and is legally binding upon it, enforceable in accordance with its terms, and does not conflict with any agreement, instrument or understanding, oral or written, to which it is a party or by which it may be bound, nor violate any material law or regulation of any court, government body or administrative or other agency having jurisdiction over it.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	it has the appropriate personnel, expertise, facilities and other resources required in order to perform all of its obligations under this Agreement.

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	6.3
</FONT>
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

	&#x2019;

<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:455.40PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;WIDTH:455.40PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT ARE DESIGNATED BY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	reasonable time after such disclosure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the foregoing, Confidential Information shall not include information that, in each case as demonstrated by written documentation:
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	was already known to the receiving Party, other than under an obligation of confidentiality, at the time of disclosure or, as shown by written documentation, was developed by the receiving Party independent of the Confidential Information of the disclosing Party;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	was generally available to the public or otherwise part of the public domain at the time of its disclosure to the receiving Party;
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	became generally available to the public or otherwise part of the public domain after its disclosure and other than through any act or omission of the receiving Party in breach of this Agreement; or
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	was subsequently lawfully disclosed to the receiving Party by a person other than the disclosing Party.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Obligations of Confidentiality and Non-Use
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Parties agree that, during the Term and for a period of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] after the expiration or termination of this Agreement, the receiving Party shall not publish or otherwise disclose, and shall not use for any purpose, any Confidential Information furnished to it by any other Party pursuant to this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each receiving Party shall use the Confidential Information of any disclosing Party solely for the purpose of exercising such receiving Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights and performing its obligations under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall limit disclosure of SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Confidential Information solely to those directors, officers and employees of Importer who need to know such Confidential Information in order for Importer to exercise its rights or perform its obligations under this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Permitted Disclosures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding the provisions of Section 8.2 above, each Party may disclose another Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Confidential Information to the extent such disclosure is reasonably necessary to comply with applicable governmental laws, regulations, or orders; provided that if a Party is required to make any such disclosure of another Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Confidential Information, it shall, to the extent it may legally do so, give reasonable advance notice to the latter Party of such disclosure and shall use its reasonable efforts to secure confidential treatment of such information prior to its disclosure (whether through protective orders or otherwise)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL may also use and disclose the Confidential Information of Importer as reasonably necessary to prosecute or defend litigation; in connection with financings, securities offerings, or mergers or acquisitions; to provide information to tax or other governmental authorities; or as otherwise reasonably necessary in connection with SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s performance under, or the enforcement of, this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Confidentiality of this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each Party shall treat this Agreement and its terms as the Confidential Information of the other Party, subject to the provisions of this Article 8, except that each Party shall be entitled to disclose
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) the identity of the other Parties to this Agreement; and (ii) this Agreement, including its terms and conditions, to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(A) its Affiliates, directors, officers, employees, consultants, members and agents, in each case from whom such disclosing Party has obtained obligations of confidentiality at least as strict as those set forth in this Article 8; (B) its potential acquirers or investors, potential merger partners or permitted assignees, in each case from whom such disclosing Party has obtained obligations of confidentiality and provided that such disclosing Party uses reasonable efforts to obtain from such persons or entities obligations of confidentiality at least as strict as those set forth in this Article 8; and (C) its advisors (including legal, tax and financial), and insurance companies and their agents
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	To the extent that any Party determines that it is required to file or register this Agreement or a notification thereof to comply with the requirements of an applicable stock exchange or NASDAQ regulation or any Government Authority, including without limitation the United States Securities and Exchange Commission or the United States Federal Trade Commission, such Party shall promptly inform the other Parties thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Prior to making any such filing, registration or notification, the Parties shall agree on the provisions of this Agreement for which the Parties shall seek confidential treatment, it being agreed that if one Party determines to seek confidential treatment for a provision for which another Party does not, then the Parties will use reasonable efforts in connection with such filing to seek the confidential treatment of any such provision
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Parties shall cooperate, each at its own expense, in such filing, registration or notification, including, without limitation, such confidential treatment request, and shall execute all documents reasonably required in connection therewith.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	8.5
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Press Releases
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Party shall use the name of another Party in relation to this transaction in any press release without the prior written consent of such other Party.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	9.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	COMPLIANCE WITH LAW
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	9.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	General
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer covenants and warrants that it shall, at all times during the Term and during any Wind-Down Period as set forth in Section 11.7(c), comply with, and require each Tier-Two Distributor to comply with, all applicable Laws and Regulations in performing its obligations or exercising its rights under or related to this Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	9.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Governmental Consent
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer covenants and warrants that it shall maintain, and require each Tier-Two Distributor to maintain, during the Term and during any Wind-Down Period as set forth in Section 11.7(c), all Licenses to permit Importer and each Tier-Two Distributor, respectively, to perform its obligations under (as applicable) this Agreement and each Tier-Two Agreement.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;WIDTH:455.40PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT ARE DESIGNATED BY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Public and Commercial Bribery Representations and Warranties of the Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer hereby represents and warrants that it has not, and agrees that it will not, in connection with the transactions involving SPIL, make or promise or offer to make any payment or transfer of anything of value, directly or indirectly
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) to any governmental official or government employee (including employees of government-owned entities or corporations); or (ii) to any political party, official of a political party or candidate (or to a third party for payment to any of the foregoing) in connection with any business activity of SPIL or its wholly or partially owned affiliates (collectively, for purposes of Section 9.3,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) in order to obtain or retain business or to secure any improper advantage
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	It is the intent of the parties that no payments or transfers of value shall be made which have the purpose or effect of public or commercial bribery, acceptance of or acquiescence in extortion, kickbacks or other unlawful or improper means of obtaining business
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This section shall not, however, prohibit normal and customary business entertainment or providing business mementos of nominal value; provided, however, that all such payments shall be lawful, reasonable, directly related to the business of the Importer, accurately described in the books and records of the Importer, and approved in advance in writing by the Legal Department of the Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	For the purpose of this contract, a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	foreign official
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	means any employee or officer of a government of a country other than the United States of America, including any federal, regional or local department, agency, enterprise owned or controlled by the foreign government, any official of a foreign political party, any official or employee of a public international organization, any person acting in an official capacity for, or on behalf of, such entities, and any candidate for foreign political office.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer Policy Certifications
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer shall, and shall cause each of its directors, officers, employees, agents or other representatives who have any direct involvement with any of the management or operations of the business of the Company to, annually certify that the Importer has not, and to its knowledge no other person, including but not limited to every director, officer, employee, representative, and agent of the Importer has, made, offered to make or agreed to make any loan, gift, donation or other payment, directly or indirectly, whether in cash or in kind, to or for the benefit of any foreign official or foreign political party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Such certification shall be in the form attached as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Exhibit H
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Continuing Obligation to Advise
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer agree that should Importer learn of or have reason to know of (i) any such payment, offer, or agreement to make a payment to a government official, political party, or political party official or candidate for the purpose of obtaining or retaining business or securing any improper advantage for the Company or Importer; or (ii) any other future development during the term of this Agreement that in any way makes inaccurate or incomplete the representations, warranties and certifications of the Importer hereunder given or made as of the date hereof or at any time during the term of this Agreement, relating to the U.S
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 as amended (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	FCPA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) or the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s Global Anti-Bribery and Anti-Corruption Policy, the Importer shall immediately advise the Company of the details of such knowledge or suspicion.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Governmental Ownership of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer hereby represent and warrant to the Company that, except as it has disclosed to the Company or as is generally available public information known to the Company, no foreign official (as defined by local law or by specifications provided by the Company) has any ownership interest, direct or indirect, in the Importer or in the contractual relationship established by this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the event that during the term of this Agreement there is acquisition of an interest of any sort or nature, direct or indirect, in the Importer or in this Agreement by a government official, the Importer covenants and agrees to make immediate, complete and accurate written disclosure to the Company thereof.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company Right of Audit and Investigation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Company shall have the right, upon written notice to the Importer, to conduct an audit of the Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s (as applicable) relevant books and records, and an investigation to verify compliance with provisions of this section
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer shall cooperate fully with such investigation, the scope, method, nature and duration of which shall be at the sole reasonable discretion of the Company.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:25PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Disclosure to U.S. Government
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer agree that full disclosure of information relating to a possible violation of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s FCPA and Anticorruption Policy or the existence and terms of this Agreement, including the compensation provisions, may be made at any time to the U.S. government and its agencies, and to whomsoever the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s General Counsel or other legal advisors determine has a legitimate need to know.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(g)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Company Rights Upon an FCPA Default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the event that the Company should believe, in good faith, that the Importer has acted or failed to act in any way that may subject the Company to liability under the FCPA or local anticorruption law (which action or failure to act is, hereinafter, an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	FCPA Default
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), the Company shall have the unilateral right, exercisable immediately upon
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	written notice to the Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:26PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to refuse, notwithstanding any other provision of this Agreement, to perform any of the Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s obligations under this Agreement; and/or
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:108PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:24PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to terminate this Agreement immediately, subject to Section 11.6.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(h)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Restrictions Concerning Agents of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Importer shall not (1) retain any representatives or other agents on behalf of the Importer or the Company or (2) make or cause to be made any payments to any such representatives or other agents, without the express prior written approval of the Company.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	10.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	INDEMNITY &amp; INSURANCE
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	10.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Indemnity by Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each of Importer shall indemnify, defend and hold harmless SPIL and its Affiliates, their respective members, directors, officers, employees, consultants, distributors and agents, and in each case their respective successors, heirs and
</FONT>
</FONT>

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	WEST\268167869.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;;FONT-SIZE: 8PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 36PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>

	CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT REQUEST &#x2013; EDITED COPY
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" ALIGN="CENTER" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:455.40PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;HEIGHT:1.00PT;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;HEIGHT:1.00PT;OVERFLOW:HIDDEN;FONT-SIZE:0PT;">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="BORDER-TOP:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-RIGHT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-LEFT:1PT SOLID #000000 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT SOLID #000000 ;WIDTH:455.40PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #AUTO;PADDING:0PT 6.5PT">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	*** CONFIDENTIAL TREATMENT HAS BEEN REQUESTED FOR CERTAIN PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	CONFIDENTIAL PORTIONS OF THIS EXHIBIT ARE DESIGNATED BY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	].
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;">
	A COMPLETE VERSION OF THIS EXHIBIT HAS BEEN FILED SEPARATELY WITH THE SECURITIES AND EXCHANGE COMMISSION.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
	&nbsp;
</P>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	assigns (collectively, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL Indemnitees
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), against any and all actual or potential damages (including all incidental, consequential and punitive damages), deficiencies, defaults, awards, settlement amounts, assessments, fines, dues, penalties, costs, liabilities, obligations, taxes, liens, losses, lost profits, fees and expenses (including court costs, interest and reasonable fees of attorneys, accountants and other experts) (collectively,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Losses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) incurred by, imposed upon or alleged against the SPIL Indemnitees or any of them in connection with any third-party claims, suits, actions, demands or judgments of whatsoever nature (a
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Claim
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) arising out of any theory or cause of action related to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) any breach by Importer of the obligations of either under this Agreement, (ii) any unlawful conduct by Importer; (iii) any aspect of the handling and distribution of Products by or on behalf of the Importer, including by any Tier-Two Distributor or other third party.
</FONT>
</P>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	10.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Indemnity Procedures
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Under the precondition that Importer or any Tier-Two Distributor is responsible for the Claim, Importer agrees, at its own expense, to provide attorneys reasonably acceptable to SPIL to defend against any Claim against any SPIL Indemnitee, whether or not such actions are rightfully brought; provided, however, that any SPIL Indemnitee shall have the right to retain its own counsel, at the expense of the Importer if representation of such SPIL Indemnitee by counsel retained by Importer would be inappropriate because of conflict of interests of such SPIL Indemnitee and any other person or party represented by such counsel
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer agree to keep SPIL, and any other SPIL Indemnitee that is a party to a Claim, informed of the progress in the defense and disposition of such Claim and to consult with SPIL, and any other SPIL Indemnitee that is party to a Claim, prior to any proposed settlement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall not enter into any settlement or judgment of any Claim that admits liability or unlawful conduct on the part of any SPIL Indemnitee, or that consents to any injunctive or other relief that impairs the business or reputation of such SPIL Indemnitee, without such SPIL Indemnitee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s prior written consent, which such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	SPIL I
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	ndemnitee shall have the right to grant or withhold at such SPIL Indemnitee
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s sole discretion.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	10.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Insurance
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall obtain and maintain at all times during the Term commercial general liability and property insurance in amounts typical for importers and exporters of pharmaceutical products as set forth under this Agreement, including insurance covering loss or theft of, or damage to, Product.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:22PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-TRANSFORM:NONE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	TERM AND TERMINATION
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement shall continue in force from the Effective Date until December 31, 2018 (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Initial Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	), unless terminated earlier under the provisions of this Article 11; provided, however, that this Agreement shall automatically renew on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	periods (each, an
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Additional Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) (the Initial Term and each Additional Term, together, the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Term
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	) unless SPIL provides written notice to Importer at least
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days before the end of the Term or such Additional Term, as applicable, that the Agreement will expire at the end of the Term or such Additional Term.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.2
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Conversion of Exclusivity to Non-Exclusivity
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If Importer does not fulfill their obligations pursuant to Section 4 (including but not limited to ordering patterns and quantities) or Section 5 including but not limited to Target Inventories, then SPIL shall be entitled, in its sole discretion, to terminate the exclusivity of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights to import Products into or distribute Products in the Territory or any portion thereof immediately upon written notice to Importer, on which date Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s rights shall become non-exclusive in the Territory or portion thereof, as set forth in such notice.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.3
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination for Convenience
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	. &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If this Agreement has become [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], then during any period that this Agreement is [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] SPIL may terminate this Agreement for any reason or no reason upon [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	written notice to Importer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.4
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination for Cause
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If any Party materially breaches this Agreement, then the non-breaching Party may give written notice to the breaching Party that if such breach is not remedied within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days, the Agreement shall be terminated
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at any time from the non-breaching Party that provide such notice.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.5
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination for Insolvency
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement shall terminate immediately if any Party is unable to pay its debts as they become due, or a petition is presented, or meeting convened for the purpose of winding up any Party, or any Party enters into liquidation whether compulsorily or voluntarily, or compounds with its creditors generally, or has a receiver appointed of all or any part of its assets, or if any event analogous to any of the foregoing shall occur in any jurisdiction in which any Party is incorporated, resident or carrying on business.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.6
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Limitation on Liability
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the event of termination by any Party in accordance with any of the provisions of this Agreement, no Party shall be liable to any other Party because of such termination for compensation, reimbursement or damages on account of the loss of prospective profits or anticipated sales or on account of expenditures, inventory, investments, leases or commitments in connection with the business or goodwill of any Party.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	11.7
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Effect of Termination or Expiration
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Accrued Liabilities
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Termination or expiration shall not relieve any Party of obligations incurred prior to the termination.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Inventory Records
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] after the effective date of termination or expiration of this Agreement, Importer shall provide and require its designees to provide SPIL with a complete inventory of Products in their possession, in transit from Importer to any Tier-Two Distributor or end user, or otherwise in the possession or control, directly or indirectly, of Importer or any Tier-Two Distributor.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
