<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Wind-Down
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon termination or expiration of this Agreement for other than breach by Importer, Importer shall be permitted for a period of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] days following the effective date of such termination or expiration (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	Wind-Down Period
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to sell and distribute such stock of the Products as it may at the time have in its possession or under its control, provided that SPIL has received payment in full for such Products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	If Importer has any Products for which SPIL has not received payment in full, then Importer shall at SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s direction either
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i) return such Products to SPIL or its designee, with reasonable expenses for packaging and shipping to be reimbursed by SPIL after receipt of such Products in saleable condition; or (ii) destroy such Products and provide written certification of such destruction to SPIL At the end of such Wind-Down Period, SPIL or its designee may repurchase, and Importer shall sell to SPIL or its designee, all of Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s remaining inventory of Products for which SPIL has received payment in full
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The price of inventory repurchased upon termination or expiration of this Agreement shall be [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Products repurchased from Importer by SPIL pursuant to this Section 11.7(b) shall be shipped promptly by Importer
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	at
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to a location specified by SPIL.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(d)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Assignment of Licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon expiration or any termination of this Agreement, Importer hereby assigns to SPIL all Licenses, authorizations, registrations, permits and approvals of any kind with respect to Products and applications therefor, including import and export Licenses
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer shall execute such documents and perform such acts as may be necessary, useful, or convenient to perfect such transfer or assignment.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(e)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Trademarks
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	All SPIL Trademarks, marks, trade names, patents, copyrights, designs, drawings, formulas or other data, photographs, samples, literature, and Product Documentation of every kind relating to the Products shall remain the property of SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Within thirty (30) days
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	after the effective date of termination or expiration of this Agreement, Importer, shall, at SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s election, either (1) destroy all tangible items bearing, containing, or contained in, any of the foregoing, in its possession or control and certify such destruction, or (2) ship such tangible items to SPIL at SPIL
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s expense
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Notwithstanding anything in this Agreement to the contrary, effective immediately and automatically upon the expiration or termination of this Agreement for any reason, Importer shall cease to use all SPIL Trademarks except as expressly permitted pursuant to Section 11.7(b) for any permitted Wind-Down Period.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:25PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(f)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Transition
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Upon termination or expiration of this Agreement, Importer shall diligently cooperate with SPIL to effect a smooth and orderly transition in the sale of the Products in the Territory.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Within [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	] of termination or expiration of this Agreement , Importer shall deliver to SPIL (i) copies of all distribution records for the previous one (1) year, and (ii) a written report identifying all distribution activities regarding the Products for the previous one (1) year
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	From the time that notice of termination or expiration is received by any Party until the effective termination date, Importer shall refer all Product inquiries to SPIL.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	12.1
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Governing Law
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Dispute Resolution
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(a)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Each Party agrees that this Agreement shall be construed and determined in accordance with the laws of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], without regard
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	], with the exception of issues that are related to the professional areas of pharmaceutical
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	products
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, such
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as the quality and circulation of pharmaceutical products, in which case the relevant laws and regulations of
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be applicable to such issues
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The U.N. Convention on the International Sale of Goods shall not apply.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(b)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Any dispute, controversy or claim arising out of or relating to this Agreement, or the breach, termination or invalidity thereof shall be settled exclusively by the binding arbitration authority set forth below in accordance with the currently effective [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Rules
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp; &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The arbitration authority will be the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The place of arbitration will be in [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	There will be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	arbitrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The language to be used in the arbitral proceedings will be
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Judgment on the award rendered by the arbitrator shall be final and binding on the parties here, and may be entered in any court having jurisdiction thereof
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Parties agree that, any provision of applicable law notwithstanding, they will not request, and the arbitrator shall have no authority to award, punitive or exemplary damages against any Party due to a breach of any obligation under this Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The Parties may apply to any court of competent jurisdiction for temporary or permanent injunctive relief, without breach of this Section 12.l(b) and without any abridgement of the powers of the arbitrator
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The arbitrator shall be authorized to apportion its fees and expenses and the reasonable attorneys
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	fees and expenses of the parties as the arbitrator deems appropriate
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In the absence of such apportionment, the prevailing party in any arbitration or other proceeding shall be entitled, in addition to all other rights and remedies it may have, to reimbursement of its expenses, including court costs and reasonable fees of attorneys and other professionals.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:72PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:23PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(c)
</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The original of the Agreement is prepared in English
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	The English version of the Agreement shall manage and control over any other versions that are translated into other languages for any purpose, including any disputes among the Parties related to the Agreement or resulting from the Agreement
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Importer hereby waives its right to use their own language for any purpose under this Agreement in accordance with the domestic law that may apply to the Importer.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:17PT;">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:4PT;TEXT-ALIGN:LEFT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Force Majeure
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No Party shall be liable to any other Party for such first Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s failure to perform any of its obligations hereunder during any period in which such performance is delayed by circumstances beyond its reasonable control including, but not limited to, fire, flood, earthquake, war, terrorist attack, embargo, strike, riot, inability to secure materials and transportation facilities, failure of suppliers, or the intervention of any Governmental Authority other than caused by such Party
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s breach of this Agreement (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	than
</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, the Party injured by the inability of the other to perform shall have the right immediately upon written notice to the other Party to either (1) terminate the Agreement with respect to Products not already shipped, or (2) treat this Agreement as suspended during the delay and reduce any commitment in proportion to the duration of the delay.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

	Entire Agreement; Amendments

	.&nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	This Agreement with its exhibits sets forth the entire agreement and understanding of the Parties relating to the subject matter herein and supersedes all prior and contemporaneous discussions and negotiations, whether oral or written, between or among them
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	No modification of or amendment to this Agreement, nor any waiver of any rights under this Agreement, shall be effective unless in writing signed by each Party.

	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	hereunder
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	refer to this Agreement as a whole and not merely to the particular provision in which such words appear, (c) words using the singular will include the plural, and vice versa, and (d) the words
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	include,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	includes
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	and
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	including
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	will be deemed to be followed by the phrase
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	but not limited to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	without limitation
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;COLOR:#000000;">
	inter alia
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	or words of similar import, and (e) references to
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Article,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Section,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	shall be deemed to include all Sections and subsections therein.
</FONT>
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;FONT-WEIGHT:NORMAL;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT; PADDING-RIGHT:12PT;">

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	Counterparts
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">

</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Exhibit G
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	EXCHANGE RATE ADJUSTMENT - EXAMPLES
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	As of the Effective Date, assume for purposes of these examples only that the Standard Exchange Rate is US$ [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] to CNY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] and the Importer Price is approximately US$ [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] based on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	i.e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] divided by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;">
	Example 1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	On July 1, 2016, assume the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] Exchange Rate is US$ [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] to CNY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Divide [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] to get [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	], which is
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] but
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	than [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	However, because on
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] the Standard Exchange Rate will be adjusted to the [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] Exchange Rate reported on that date, as of [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	:&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	(a) the Standard Exchange Rate shall be adjusted to US$ [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] to CNY [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] and (b) the Importer Price shall be adjusted to US$ [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-STYLE:ITALIC;">
	i.e.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, &nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;[
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] divided by [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]).
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

</FONT>

</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]) to get [
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	***

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	]

	] Exchange Rate is

	than [

	***
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	] of the then-effective Standard Exchange Rate, the Standard Exchange Rate will remain unchanged and there will be no change to the Importer Price.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-INDENT:36PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;TEXT-DECORATION:UNDERLINE;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Exhibit H
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FORM OF FCPA CERTIFICATION
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	I,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	_____________________________________________
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	a duly authorized [representative of] or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	[vendor for]_____________[vendor, agent, consultant or representative name], confirm that I, my company, and anyone retained by me or my company are aware of and understand SciClone Pharmaceuticals International China Holding Ltd.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	s (the
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Company
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	) Global Anti-Bribery and Anti-Corruption Policy based on the U.S. Foreign Corrupt Practices Act of 1977 as amended, (
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	FCPA
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	), and that since the date of my last certification, I, my company, and everyone retained by me or my company have not violated, nor caused the Company to violate the PCPA in connection with my representation of the Company in any country.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	I confirm that, except as expressly disclosed to the Company or as is generally available public information known to the Company, neither I nor my company is a governmental entity or political party in the country in which I represent the Company, and that no officer, director, stockholder, employee or agent of my company is a government, governmental entity, or
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	foreign official
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	, as
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	that term is defined below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	Foreign Official
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	is defined as:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(i)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 25.2PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any officer or employee of the foreign country
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x2019;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	s government,
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	including any federal, regional or local department, agency, state-owned or state-controlled enterprise or corporation or other instrumentality thereof;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(ii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 21.6PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any person acting in an official capacity for or on behalf of any such entities identified in clause (i);
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(iii)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 18PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any official of a political party, or candidate or nominee of any political party in the foreign country or for any position with any entity identified in clause (i) above; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 72PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	(iv)
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 21.6PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	any official or employee of a public international organization.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	In connection with [my representation of] or [services provided for] the Company, neither I, nor my company, nor any of its officers, directors, stockholders, employees or agents have offered, paid, promised to pay, or authorized the payment of any money, or offered, the payment of any money or anything of value to (a) any
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201C;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	foreign official
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	&#x201D;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	as that term is defined above, or (b) any person, while knowing that all or a portion of such money or thing of value will be offered or given directly or indirectly to any official, political party, or to any candidate for political office for any of the prohibited purposes listed below
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	.&nbsp;
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	These prohibited purposes are:
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	1.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to influence any act or decision of such foreign official, political party, party official, or candidate in his or its official capacity,
</FONT>
</P>
<P>
<FONT SIZE="1">
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;LINE-HEIGHT:10PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 8PT">
<FONT STYLE="FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:8PT;TEXT-DECORATION:NONE;DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	WEST\268167869.1
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	2.
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to induce such foreign official, political party, party official, or candidate to do or omit to do any act in violation of the lawful duty of such foreign official, political party, party official, or candidate,
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;BORDER-BOTTOM:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to secure any improper advantage; or
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT 0PT 12PT 36PT;TEXT-INDENT: -36PT;BORDER-TOP:1PT NONE #D9D9D9 ;TEXT-ALIGN:JUSTIFY;TEXT-JUSTIFY:INTER-IDEOGRAPH;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	4.

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;;FONT-SIZE: 12PT;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;TEXT-INDENT:0PT;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;PADDING:0PT 28.8PT 0PT 0PT;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
</FONT>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;COLOR:#000000;">
	to induce such foreign official, political party, party official, or candidate to use his or its influence with a foreign government or instrumentality thereof to affect or influence any act or decision of such government or instrumentality,
</FONT>

	CONSENT OF INDEPENDENT REGISTERED PUBLIC ACCOUNTING FIRM
</FONT>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	) &nbsp;

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	and Form S-8 (

	Nos. 333-145281, 333-128482, 333-120008, 333-109256, 033-66832, 333-98081, 333-45820, 333-62059, 333-12169, 333-168668, 333-183171 and 333-205554

	) of SciClone Pharmaceuticals, Inc. of our report

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:AUTO;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b) Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;

	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer(s) and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION OF CHIEF FINANCIAL OFFICER PURSUANT TO SECTION 302 OF THE

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

	SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Wilson W. Cheung, certify that:

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	2.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:AUTO;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, this report does not contain any untrue statement of a material fact or omit to state a material fact necessary to make the statements made, in light of the circumstances under which such statements were made, not misleading with respect to the period covered by this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">

	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	3.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:AUTO;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	Based on my knowledge, the financial statements, and other financial information included in this report, fairly present in all material respects the financial condition, results of operations and cash flows of the registrant as of, and for, the periods presented in this report;
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">

<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	4.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:AUTO;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I are responsible for establishing and maintaining disclosure controls and procedures (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(e) and 15d-15(e)) and internal control over financial reporting (as defined in Exchange Act Rules 13a-15(f) and 15d-15(f)) for the registrant and have:
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a) Designed such disclosure controls and procedures, or caused such disclosure controls and procedures to be designed under our supervision, to ensure that material information relating to the registrant, including its consolidated subsidiaries, is made known to us by others within those entities, particularly during the period in which this report is being prepared;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b) Designed such internal control over financial reporting, or caused such internal control over financial reporting to be designed under our supervision, to provide reasonable assurance regarding the reliability of financial reporting and the preparation of financial statements for external purposes in accordance with generally accepted accounting principles;
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(c) Evaluated the effectiveness of the registrant&#x2019;s disclosure controls and procedures and presented in this report our conclusions about the effectiveness of the disclosure controls and procedures, as of the end of the period covered by this report based on such evaluation; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(d) Disclosed in this report any change in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting that occurred during the registrant&#x2019;s most recent fiscal quarter (the registrant&#x2019;s fourth fiscal quarter in the case of an annual report) that has materially affected, or is reasonably likely to materially affect, the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 6PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;">
	&nbsp;
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">

<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	5.
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:AUTO;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	The registrant&#x2019;s other certifying officer and I have disclosed, based on our most recent evaluation of internal control over financial reporting, to the registrant&#x2019;s auditors and the audit committee of the registrant&#x2019;s board of directors (or persons performing the equivalent functions):
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
</TR>
</TABLE>
</DIV>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(a) All significant deficiencies and material weaknesses in the design or operation of internal control over financial reporting which are reasonably likely to adversely affect the registrant&#x2019;s ability to record, process, summarize and report financial information; and
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:6PT 0PT 0PT 43.2PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(b) Any fraud, whether or not material, that involves management or other employees who have a significant role in the registrant&#x2019;s internal control over financial reporting.
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 12PT">

<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	EXHIBIT 32.1
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_3"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">

</FONT>

<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">

<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Friedhelm Blobel, Chief Executive Officer and President, of SciClone Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (the &#x201C;Registrant&#x201D;), do hereby certify in accordance with 18 U.S.C. 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that, based on my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">

	(1)

	the

</FONT>
</P>
</TD>

<EFX_EXHIBIT_32>
<A NAME="FIS_EXHIBIT_32_2"></A>
<DIV STYLE="MARGIN-LEFT:12PT;MARGIN-RIGHT:12PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;LINE-HEIGHT:100%;TEXT-ALIGN:RIGHT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<A NAME="SCLN-20151231XEX322_HTM__GOBACK">
</A>
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	EXHIBIT 32.2
</FONT>
</P>
<EFX_CERTIFICATION>
<A NAME="FIS_CERTIFICATION_4"></A>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT 0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	CERTIFICATION PURSUANT TO 18 U.S.C. SECTION 1350, AS ADOPTED PURSUANT TO SECTION 906
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;TEXT-ALIGN:CENTER;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-WEIGHT:BOLD;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	OF THE SARBANES-OXLEY ACT OF 2002
</FONT>
</P>
<P STYLE="MARGIN:12PT 0PT;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;COLOR:#000000;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	I, Wilson W. Cheung, Senior Vice President, Finance and Chief Financial Officer, of SciClone Pharmaceuticals, Inc. (the &#x201C;Registrant&#x201D;), do hereby certify in accordance with 18 U.S.C. 1350, as adopted pursuant to Section&nbsp;906 of the Sarbanes-Oxley Act of 2002, that, based on my knowledge:
</FONT>
</P>
<DIV STYLE="WIDTH:100%">
<TABLE CELLPADDING="0" CELLSPACING="0" STYLE="BORDER-COLLAPSE:COLLAPSE;WIDTH: 100.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;MARGIN-LEFT:0PT;">
<TR>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:04.00%;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	(1)
</FONT>
</P>
</TD>
<TD VALIGN="TOP" STYLE="WIDTH:AUTO;BACKGROUND-COLOR: #FFFFFF;PADDING:0PT;">
<P STYLE="MARGIN:0PT;FONT-FAMILY:CALIBRI;LINE-HEIGHT:115%;FONT-SIZE: 10PT">
<FONT STYLE="DISPLAY: INLINE;FONT-FAMILY:TIMES NEW ROMAN;FONT-SIZE:10PT;">
	the
</FONT>
